TEXT.English: Deceiver CT
TEXT.Polish: Zwodniczy CT

TEXT.English: Deceiver I
TEXT.Polish: Zwodniczy I

TEXT.English: Positive Trait "What sets man apart from the animals is his ability to deceive. The only way to be a step ahead of the enemy is to know them well, and let them know only of you what you want them to believe. Misdirection is the path to victory!" While you are a clever Leader who often misdirects his foes into strategic traps, and your spies are top notch, your people don't appreciate being lied to and being subject to intrusive investigations. Other nations are particularly suspicious of you and your people. Primary Benefits: [ICON_BULLET]All cities produce a couple more base Espionage. [ICON_BULLET]All cities gain a percentage modifier to Espionage. [ICON_BULLET]All Specialists produce an extra Espionage. [ICON_BULLET]Your Spy units are assigned the Deceiver I Promotion, making them harder to catch and giving them improved chances of escape. Side Benefits: [ICON_BULLET]Buildings that are focused on Investigations and Security are faster to build. [ICON_BULLET]Spy type Specialists generate an additional Commerce. [ICON_BULLET]Citizen and Slave type Specialists generate an additional Espionage. [ICON_BULLET]Your Capital produces a small percentage more Espionage. [ICON_BULLET]Technologies that lead to Investigation and Security Improvements are faster to discover. [ICON_BULLET]Espionage units are trained with a few extra Experience Points. [ICON_BULLET]Espionage units are trained faster. [ICON_BULLET]Espionage missions are harder to perform against your nation. [ICON_BULLET]Great Spies are more likely to be born. Penalties: [ICON_BULLET]Your cities are less Happy thanks to a lack of privacy. [ICON_BULLET]Civic Anarchy times are a little longer since the people are more suspicious of the intentions behind any change in policy. [ICON_BULLET]You take a diplomacy penalty since Leaders have a hard time trusting you. [ICON_BULLET]Enemies suffer less War Weariness since their people often feel justified in being at war with you. [ICON_BULLET]Your cities suffer a bit more Crime since the people tend to follow your example of dishonest behavior.

Inne narody s¹ szczególnie podejrzliwe w stosunku do ciebie i twoich ludzi. G³ówne korzyœci: [ICON_BULLET]Wszystkie miasta produkuj¹ o kilka bazowych punktów szpiegostwa wiêcej. [ICON_BULLET]Wszystkie miasta zyskuj¹ procentowy modyfikator do Szpiegostwa. [ICON_BULLET]Wszyscy Specjaliœci produkuj¹ dodatkowe Szpiegostwo. [ICON_BULLET]Twoje jednostki szpiegowskie otrzymuj¹ Awans Zwodniczy I, dziêki czemu trudniej je z³apaæ, co daje wiêksze szanse na ucieczkê. Korzyœci dodatkowe: [ICON_BULLET]Budynki skupiaj¹ce siê na dochodzeniach i bezpieczeñstwie s¹ szybsze w budowie. [ICON_BULLET]Specjaliœci typu szpieg generuj¹ dodatkowe Bogactwo. [ICON_BULLET]Specjaliœci typu Obywatel i Niewolnik generuj¹ dodatkowe Szpiegostwo. [ICON_BULLET]Twoja Stolica wytwarza niewielki procent wiêcej Szpiegostwa. [ICON_BULLET]Technologie, które prowadz¹ do ulepszeñ Dochodzeñ i Bezpieczeñstwa s¹ szybsze do odkrycia. [ICON_BULLET]Jednostki szpiegowskie zyskuj¹ kilka dodatkowych punktów Doœwiadczenia. [ICON_BULLET]Jednostki szpiegowskie s¹ szkolone szybciej. [ICON_BULLET]Misje szpiegowskie s¹ trudniejsze do wykonania przeciwko twojemu narodowi. [ICON_BULLET]Wielcy szpiedzy rodz¹ siê czêœciej. Kary: [ICON_BULLET]Twoje miasta s¹ mniej szczêœliwe z powodu braku prywatnoœci. [ICON_BULLET]Czasy Anarchii trwaj¹ trochê d³u¿ej, poniewa¿ ludzie s¹ bardziej podejrzliwi co do intencji stoj¹cych za jak¹kolwiek zmian¹ polityki. [ICON_BULLET]Ponosisz karê dyplomatyczn¹, poniewa¿ przywódcy maj¹ trudnoœci z zaufaniem ci. [ICON_BULLET]Wrogowie cierpi¹ mniej Zmêczenie Wojn¹, poniewa¿ ich ludzie czêsto czuj¹ siê usprawiedliwieni, prowadz¹c z tob¹ wojnê. [ICON_BULLET]Twoje miasta cierpi¹ z powodu nieco wiêkszej przestêpczoœci, poniewa¿ ludzie maj¹ tendencjê do naœladowania Twojego przyk³adu nieuczciwego zachowania.

TEXT.English: Positive Trait "What sets man apart from the animals is his ability to deceive. The only way to be a step ahead of the enemy is to know them well, and let them know only of you what you want them to believe. Misdirection is the path to victory!" While you are a clever Leader who often misdirects his foes into strategic traps, and your spies are top notch, your people don't appreciate being lied to and being subject to intrusive investigations. Other nations are particularly suspicious of you and your people. Primary Benefits: [ICON_BULLET]All cities produce a couple more base Espionage. [ICON_BULLET]All cities gain a significant percentage modifier to Espionage. [ICON_BULLET]All Specialists produce an extra Espionage. [ICON_BULLET]Your Spy units are assigned the Deceiver Promotion, making them harder to catch and giving them improved chances of escape. Side Benefits: [ICON_BULLET]Buildings that are focused on Investigations and Security are faster to build. [ICON_BULLET]Spy and Investigator type Specialists generate an additional Commerce. [ICON_BULLET]Spy and Investigator type Specialists generate a few more Espionage. [ICON_BULLET]Citizen and Slave type Specialists give an additional Espionage. [ICON_BULLET]Your Capital produces a percentage more Espionage. [ICON_BULLET]Technologies that lead to Investigation and Security Improvements are faster to discover. [ICON_BULLET]Espionage units are trained with a few extra Experience Points. [ICON_BULLET]Espionage units are trained faster. [ICON_BULLET]Espionage missions are harder to perform against your nation. [ICON_BULLET]Great Spies are more likely to be born. [ICON_BULLET]Your units are harder to capture since they fear the kind of interrogation practices they would use on captured foes. Penalties: [ICON_BULLET]Your cities are less Happy thanks to a lack of privacy. [ICON_BULLET]Civic Anarchy times are a little longer since the people are more suspicious of the intentions behind any change in policy. [ICON_BULLET]You take a diplomacy penalty since Leaders have a hard time trusting you. [ICON_BULLET]Enemies suffer less War Weariness since their people often feel justified in being at war with you. [ICON_BULLET]Your cities suffer a bit more Crime since the people tend to follow your example of dishonest behavior. [ICON_BULLET]Your cities are harder to Educate since a lot of misinformation is circulating about.

TEXT.English: Strong Espionage. People mistrust your Leader.
TEXT.French: Espionnage fort. Les gens se méfient de votre chef.

TEXT.Polish: Nadmierny CT

TEXT.English: Excessive I
TEXT.Polish: Nadmierny I

TEXT.English: Negative Trait "Budget is no object. I shall have a massive army at my disposal and everything I want. I am King, am I not?" Your people spend their lives frustrated with your abuses of power but because of their economic desperation, they will be quick to sign up for government jobs in construction and military enlistment. Overspending and a failure to invest wisely creates budgetary shortfalls. Primary Penalties: [ICON_BULLET]One less Commerce is generated by any plot that generates as much as 7 or more. [ICON_BULLET]All cities lose a base Commerce. [ICON_BULLET]All cities lose a percentage penalty to Commerce. Side Penalties: [ICON_BULLET]An extra Unhappiness in every city. [ICON_BULLET]All Trade Routes lose a percentage penalty to Commerce. [ICON_BULLET]Commerce focused Improvements generate less Commerce. [ICON_BULLET]Commerce focused Improvements upgrade much slower than normal. [ICON_BULLET]Commerce focused Improvements are much slower for your Workers to build. [ICON_BULLET]Lawyer, Citizen, and Slave type Specialists lose a Commerce. [ICON_BULLET]Great Statesmen are less likely to be born. Benefits: [ICON_BULLET]World Wonders are constructed faster. [ICON_BULLET]National Wonders are constructed faster. [ICON_BULLET]Team Projects are constructed faster. [ICON_BULLET]You can draft a few more citizens than normal during a conscript action in a city. [ICON_BULLET]Maintenance from Number of Cities is significantly reduced due to allowing numerous budget debts to go unpaid. [ICON_BULLET]Gain an extra result from each Goody Hut you explore.

Nadmierne wydatki i brak m¹drych inwestycji powoduj¹ niedobory bud¿etowe. Podstawowe kary: [ICON_BULLET]Jeden punkt Bogactwa mniej jest generowany przez ka¿de pole, które generuje a¿ 7 lub wiêcej. [ICON_BULLET]Wszystkie szlaki handlowe trac¹ procentow¹ karê do Bogactwa. [ICON_BULLET]Ulepszenia skupione na bogactwie generuj¹ mniej Bogactwa. [ICON_BULLET]Projekty zespo³owe powstaj¹ szybciej. [ICON_BULLET]Mo¿esz zwerbowaæo kilka obywateli wiêcej ni¿ normalnie podczas akcji poborowej w mieœcie. TEXT.English: Expansive CT
TEXT.Polish: Ekspansywny CT

TEXT.English: Expansive I
TEXT.Polish: Ekspansywny I

TEXT.English: Positive Trait "Only a large and populace nation can command great power. Land is the only real commodity." For players that race other nations to capture and develop as much real estate as they can as fast as they can, this trait is the perfect selection. It supercharges and settlers and even supports a larger empire with reduced size based Maintenance factors. Your people, just as your Leader, are impatient to branch out, so patient Research and impressive works are less important here. Primary Benefits: [ICON_BULLET]All cities gain a percentage modifier to Food and Production. [ICON_BULLET]Settlers are trained much faster than normal. [ICON_BULLET]Workers are trained significantly faster than normal. [ICON_BULLET]Improvements organically upgrade twice as fast as usual. [ICON_BULLET]Workers are far faster at improving your territory. Side Benefits: [ICON_BULLET]On the Revolutions option, instability from the Distance to Capital is reduced. [ICON_BULLET]Your cities all produce an extra base Food and Production. [ICON_BULLET]Upkeep from the Distance to Capital is reduced. [ICON_BULLET]Upkeep from Number of Cities is reduced. [ICON_BULLET]You get a bonus amount of Free Units derived from a small percentage of your overall Population. [ICON_BULLET]Your Largest Cities are Happier since your citizens feel a sense of accomplishment in a highly populated area. Penalties: [ICON_BULLET]World Wonders are constructed slower than normal since these large projects greatly delay expansion efforts. [ICON_BULLET]Your cities are all penalized with one less base Research. [ICON_BULLET]Your cities all suffer from a percentage reduction to Research. [ICON_BULLET]Scientist and Doctor type Specialists spend their time supporting the frontier more and thus produce one less Research. [ICON_BULLET]Your cities are a little less defensible because your cities are constructed with haste.

TEXT.English: Fast Development of the land and seeding of new cities
TEXT.French: Développement rapide des terres et ensemencement de nouvelles villes
TEXT.Russian: Áûñòðîå îñâîåíèå çåìåëü è ðîñò íîâûõ ãîðîäîâ
TEXT.Polish: Szybki rozwój ziemi i zak³adanie nowych miast

TEXT.English: Financial CT
TEXT.Polish: Ekonomiczny CT

TEXT.English: Financial I
TEXT.Polish: Ekonomiczny I

TEXT.English: Positive Trait "Nothing can't be bought so proper investments cannot fail to achieve victory." Few nations like to think their rulers waste the taxes that are collected and this one can show a nicely balanced budget that plans each measure of spending quite carefully to get the maximum results. The Leader is a genius when it comes to finances but may shave corners in a few areas that could lead to some dangerous results for the nation. Regardless, wealth is clearly more easily obtained within these borders, which is an envious position to be in. Primary Benefits: [ICON_BULLET]All cities produce a couple more base Gold. [ICON_BULLET]All cities gain a percentage modifier to Gold. [ICON_BULLET]All Specialists produce an extra Gold. [ICON_BULLET]The cost of rushing buildings and units is reduced significantly. Side Benefits: [ICON_BULLET]Your cities are all Happier with greater wealth going around and more fiscal responsibility in government. [ICON_BULLET]The overall upkeep expense for this nation is reduced. [ICON_BULLET]More Great People are born here because financial opportunities to invest into personal achievements are more readily available. [ICON_BULLET]Buildings that are focused on wealth generation are faster to build. [ICON_BULLET]Merchant type Specialists generate an additional Commerce. [ICON_BULLET]Citizen and Slave type Specialists give an additional Gold. [ICON_BULLET]Your Capital produces a small percentage more Gold. [ICON_BULLET]Technologies that lead to wealth Improvements are faster to discover. [ICON_BULLET]Corporate Maintenance is reduced. Corporations benefit from more relaxed policies that help them get more out of their investments. [ICON_BULLET]Great Merchants are more likely to be born. Penalties: [ICON_BULLET]Civic Anarchy times are a bit longer. It takes longer to figure out how to optimize spending in a new governmental structure. [ICON_BULLET]All Improvements take a lot longer to upgrade naturally since your nation refuses to budget for such projects until absolutely necessary. [ICON_BULLET]Workers take longer to place Improvements because they tend to get things done on a shoestring budget. [ICON_BULLET]All units receive a little less investment into training thus lose an Experience when trained. [ICON_BULLET]Shaving costs on defensive preparations leads to a slightly reduced City Defense Modifier. [ICON_BULLET]Espionage Defense is slightly reduced due to underspending on security monitoring. [ICON_BULLET]Your defenses are somewhat more easily bombarded due to cutting costs in material expenses when constructing your fortifications. [ICON_BULLET]It takes slightly more Food to grow your cities. With less government funding for family support programs, there is more reluctance to raise children until the providers have more firmly established their careers. [ICON_BULLET]Slightly higher Crime rate. More wealth circulating in your communities means there is a bit more to commit Crimes.
TEXT.Polish: Pozytywna cecha "Wszystko ma swoj¹ cenê, wiêc odpowiednie inwestycje nie mog¹ nie doprowadziæ do zwyciêstwa." Niewiele narodów lubi myœleæ, ¿e ich w³adcy marnuj¹ pobierane podatki, a ten mo¿e wykazaæ siê ³adnie zrównowa¿onym bud¿etem, który doœæ dok³adnie planuje ka¿dy poziom wydatków, aby uzyskaæ maksymalne zyski. Lider ten jest geniuszem, jeœli chodzi o finanse, ale mo¿e ogoliæ pewne obszary w kilku obszarach, co mo¿e prowadziæ do niebezpiecznych skutków dla narodu. Niezale¿nie od tego, bogactwo jest wyraŸnie ³atwiejsze do zdobycia, co jest sytuacj¹ godn¹ pozazdroszczenia. G³ówne korzyœci: [ICON_BULLET]Wszystkie miasta produkuj¹ o kilka bazowego z³ota wiêcej. [ICON_BULLET]Wszystkie miasta zyskuj¹ procentowy modyfikator do z³ota. [ICON_BULLET]Wszyscy specjaliœci produkuj¹ dodatkowe z³oto. Korzyœci uboczne: [ICON_BULLET]Wszystkie Twoje miasta s¹ szczêœliwsze dziêki wiêkszemu bogactwu i wiêkszej odpowiedzialnoœci fiskalnej rz¹du. [ICON_BULLET]Ca³kowite koszty utrzymania tego kraju s¹ zmniejszone. [ICON_BULLET]Wielcy ludzie rodz¹ siê tutaj szybciej, poniewa¿ maj¹ mo¿liwoœci finansowe inwestowaæ w osi¹gniêcia osobiste. TEXT.English: Financial II
TEXT.Polish: Ekonomiczny II

TEXT.English: Positive Trait "Nothing can't be bought so proper investments cannot fail to achieve victory." Few nations like to think their rulers waste the taxes that are collected and this one can show a nicely balanced budget that plans each measure of spending quite carefully to get the maximum results. The Leader is a genius when it comes to finances but may shave corners in a few areas that could lead to some dangerous results for the nation. Regardless, wealth is clearly more easily obtained within these borders, which is an envious position to be in. Primary Benefits: [ICON_BULLET]All cities produce more base Gold. [ICON_BULLET]All cities gain a percentage modifier to Gold. [ICON_BULLET]All Specialists produce an extra Gold. [ICON_BULLET]The cost of rushing buildings and units is reduced significantly. Side Benefits: [ICON_BULLET]Your cities are all Happier with greater wealth going around and more fiscal responsibility in government. [ICON_BULLET]The overall upkeep expense for this nation is reduced. [ICON_BULLET]More Great People are born here because financial opportunities to invest into personal achievements are more readily available. [ICON_BULLET]Buildings that are focused on wealth generation are faster to build. [ICON_BULLET]Noble type Specialists generate an additional Commerce. [ICON_BULLET]Merchant type Specialists give a few additional Gold. [ICON_BULLET]Your Capital produces a small percentage more Gold. [ICON_BULLET]Technologies that lead to wealth Improvements are faster to discover. [ICON_BULLET]Corporate Maintenance is significantly reduced. Corporations benefit from more relaxed policies that help them get more out of their investments. [ICON_BULLET]Great Merchants are significantly more likely to be born. Penalties: [ICON_BULLET]Civic Anarchy times are a bit longer. It takes longer to figure out how to optimize spending in a new governmental structure. [ICON_BULLET]All Improvements take a lot longer to upgrade naturally since your nation refuses to budget for such projects until absolutely necessary. [ICON_BULLET]Workers take longer to place Improvements because they tend to get things done on a shoestring budget. [ICON_BULLET]All units receive a little less investment into training thus lose an Experience when trained. [ICON_BULLET]Shaving costs on defensive preparations leads to a slightly reduced City Defense Modifier. [ICON_BULLET]Espionage Defense is slightly reduced due to underspending on security monitoring. [ICON_BULLET]Your defenses are somewhat more easily bombarded due to cutting costs in material expenses when constructing your fortifications. [ICON_BULLET]It takes slightly more Food to grow your cities. With less government funding for family support programs, there is more reluctance to raise children until the providers have more firmly established their careers. [ICON_BULLET]A bit higher Crime rate. More wealth circulating in your communities means there is a bit more to commit Crimes.

Few nations like to think their rulers waste the taxes that are collected and this one can show a nicely balanced budget that plans each measure of spending quite carefully to get the maximum results. The Leader is a genius when it comes to finances but may shave corners in a few areas that could lead to some dangerous results for the nation. Regardless, wealth is clearly more easily obtained within these borders, which is an envious position to be in. Primary Benefits: [ICON_BULLET]All cities produce a significant amount more base Gold. [ICON_BULLET]All cities gain a percentage modifier to Gold. [ICON_BULLET]All Specialists produce an extra Gold. [ICON_BULLET]The cost of rushing buildings and units is reduced significantly. [ICON_BULLET]Noble type Specialists give a few additional Gold. [ICON_BULLET]Your Capital produces a small percentage more Gold. [ICON_BULLET]Technologies that lead to wealth Improvements are faster to discover. [ICON_BULLET]Corporate Maintenance is significantly reduced. Corporations benefit from more relaxed policies that help them get more out of their investments. [ICON_BULLET]Great Merchants are much more likely to be born. Penalties: [ICON_BULLET]Civic Anarchy times are a bit longer. It takes longer to figure out how to optimize spending in a new governmental structure. [ICON_BULLET]Workers take longer to place Improvements because they tend to get things done on a shoestring budget. [ICON_BULLET]Slightly higher Crime rate. More wealth circulating in your communities means there is a bit more to commit Crimes.

TEXT.English: Strong Gold generation. People are Happy the Leader efficiently utilizes their taxes. Budget cutting leads to less quality in some areas such as training and defense.
TEXT.French: Forte génération d'or. Les gens sont heureux que le Leader utilise efficacement ses impôts. La réduction budgétaire entraîne une baisse de la qualité dans certains domaines tels que la formation et la défense.

TEXT.English: Foreigner CT
TEXT.Polish: Cudzoziemiec CT

TEXT.English: Foreigner I
TEXT.Polish: Cudzoziemiec I

TEXT.English: Negative Trait "I know not everyone understands where I'm coming from here. But if you can see our nation the way I do, from the unique perspective I have here, you would understand why I support these policies." The people aren't entirely behind this Leader. He is an outsider, probably due to being born in another country, or from a severe minority, always suspicious of his intentions and resentful of his heritage. In some cases, this Leader may be an outsider due to an unusual arrangement of loyalty to another nation. Primary Penalties: [ICON_BULLET]All cities suffer a percentage penalty to Culture and Espionage. [ICON_BULLET]Civic Anarchy Times are dramatically increased while Religious Anarchy periods are significantly longer. [ICON_BULLET]Units trained in the Capital gain a percentage penalty to their starting Experience Points. Side Penalties: [ICON_BULLET]Great Military People emerge slightly slower here due to some lack of loyalty felt in the military. [ICON_BULLET]National Wonders are constructed slower since the people don't feel this Leader has the right to spearhead this sort of domestic program. [ICON_BULLET]All cities suffer a reduction in base Culture and Espionage. [ICON_BULLET]Your Capital loses a percentage penalty to Food, Production and Commerce. [ICON_BULLET]Spy Type Specialists earn one less Gold, Research, Espionage and Culture. [ICON_BULLET]Your Capital suffers a percentage penalty to Culture and Espionage. [ICON_BULLET]You can conscript one less citizen with a draft action in a city. Benefits: [ICON_BULLET]World Wonders and Team Projects are faster to construct. Your Leader is always looking for ways to build up how his people perceive him and therefore budgets more for this sort of project. [ICON_BULLET]Corporation Maintenance is reduced since your Leader is against international tariffs. [ICON_BULLET]You gain a Diplomatic bonus. World Leaders respect your mixed heritage and some may even feel they have a special inroad with you as a result. [ICON_BULLET]Foreign Trade Routes are much more profitable since you are strongly in favor of international Trade-friendly policies.

In some cases, this Leader may be an outsider due to an unusual arrangement of loyalty to another nation. [ICON_BULLET]Foreign Trade Routes are much more profitable since you are strongly in favor of international Trade-friendly policies.

TEXT.English: Has difficulty with resistance to his authority and government doesn't function very well as a result. Others resist any changes he wishes to implement. National Pride is lacking (-Culture) and foreign sympathies leaves him blinded (-Espionage)
TEXT.French: A du mal avec l'opposition à son autorité et le gouvernement ne fonctionne pas très bien en conséquence. D'autres résistent à tout changement qu'il souhaite mettre en oeuvre. La fierté nationale fait défaut (-Culture) et les sympathies étrangères le rendent aveugle (-Espionnage)

TEXT.Polish: Ma problemy z powodu oporu wobec swojej w³adzy, w wyniku czego rz¹d nie funkcjonuje zbyt dobrze. Inni sprzeciwiaj¹ siê wszelkim zmianom, które chcia³by wprowadziæ. Brakuje mu dumy narodowej (-Kultura), a zagraniczne sympatie pozostawiaj¹ go zaœlepionego (-Szpiegostwo)

TEXT.English: Humanitarian CT
TEXT.Polish: Humanitarny CT

TEXT.English: Humanitarian I
TEXT.Polish: Humanitarny I

TEXT.English: Positive Trait "Kindness and compassion are not optional. To be otherwise is to make all achievement worthless. Our people will be well taken care of and all others will envy this treatment." This truly good person is a Leader many would love to live under. His nation is well cared for and nurtured and he spends time considering how to make life better and longer for the citizens in his charge. As a result, the whole culture of the nation comes together in support of one another. They aren't very willing warriors, but if they do go to war, as it is sometimes necessary, they make sure to have the most competent sources of healing support available at the front. It can also be a little expensive to run a country this way, but usually a lot more population can be supported, which can make up for the costs. Primary Benefits: [ICON_BULLET]Your Cities are much Healthier. Unique Benefits: [ICON_BULLET]Your Healer and Recon units gain the Humanitarian I Promotion for free. It enhances healing support skills for the unit and reduces local Disease a little. Side Benefits: [ICON_BULLET]Your cities are all Happier knowing their Leader truly cares for their well-being. [ICON_BULLET]Great People are born a little faster in this uplifting nation. [ICON_BULLET]Your cities are more stable on the Revolution option. [ICON_BULLET]Priest Type Specialists gain a Food each because they spend more of their time gardening for the community. [ICON_BULLET]Citizen, and Slave Type Specialists gain a Culture. [ICON_BULLET]Priest Type Specialists gain an additional Research. [ICON_BULLET]Your Largest cities are Happier because you are able to reach more people in need with support programs in the largest urban centers. [ICON_BULLET]You gain a Diplomatic bonus for being well known to have good intentions. [ICON_BULLET]Your cities enjoy somewhat reduced Crime levels. [ICON_BULLET]Your cities enjoy somewhat reduced Disease levels. Penalties: [ICON_BULLET]Generic Upkeep is higher as it can be expensive ensuring the adequate care of all citizens. [ICON_BULLET]Priest Type Specialists lose a Production each because they spend more of their time gardening for the community. [ICON_BULLET]Military Training Type Specialists generate a Gold less each. [ICON_BULLET]This nation suffers from more War Weariness because they value well-being and care about people. [ICON_BULLET]You can draft a few less citizens than normal with a conscript action. [ICON_BULLET]Your Military units take longer to train because many of your people are squeamish about violence and require more conditioning than normal. [ICON_BULLET]Your cities resent being whipped to rush construction and training significantly longer than normal.
TEXT.Polish: Pozytywna cecha "¯yczliwoœæ i wspó³czucie nie s¹ opcjonalne. Inna sytuacja oznacza, ¿e wszystkie osi¹gniêcia staj¹ siê bezwartoœciowe. Nasi ludzie bêd¹ pod dobr¹ opiek¹, a wszyscy inni pozazdroszcz¹ takiego traktowania." Ta naprawdê dobra osoba jest Liderem, pod okiem którego wielu chcia³oby ¿yæ . Jego naród jest otoczony dobr¹ opiek¹ i pielêgnowany, a on spêdza czas na zastanawianiu siê, w jaki sposób uczyniæ ¿ycie obywateli pod jego opiek¹ lepszym i d³u¿szym. W rezultacie ca³a kultura narodu jednoczy siê, wspieraj¹c siê nawzajem. Nie s¹ zbyt chêtnymi wojownikami, ale jeœli id¹ na wojnê, a czasami jest to konieczne, upewniaj¹ siê, ¿e na froncie maj¹ najbardziej kompetentne wsparcie medyczne. Zarz¹dzanie krajem w ten sposób mo¿e byæ równie¿ trochê kosztowne, ale zazwyczaj mo¿na utrzymaæ znacznie wiêksz¹ populacjê, co mo¿e zrekompensowaæ koszty. TEXT.English: Humanitarian II
TEXT.Polish: Humanitarny II

TEXT.English: Positive Trait "Kindness and compassion are not optional. To be otherwise is to make all achievement worthless. Our people will be well taken care of and all others will envy this treatment." This truly good person is a Leader many would love to live under. His nation is well cared for and nurtured and he spends time considering how to make life better and longer for the citizens in his charge. As a result, the whole culture of the nation comes together in support of one another. They aren't very willing warriors, but if they do go to war, as it is sometimes necessary, they make sure to have the most competent sources of healing support available at the front. It can also be a little expensive to run a country this way, but usually a lot more population can be supported, which can make up for the costs. Primary Benefits: [ICON_BULLET]Your Cities are a great deal Healthier. Unique Benefits: [ICON_BULLET]Your Healer and Recon units gain the Humanitarian II Promotion for free. It enhances healing support skills for the unit and reduces local Disease a little. Side Benefits: [ICON_BULLET]Your cities are all Happier knowing their Leader truly cares for their well-being. [ICON_BULLET]Great People are born moderately faster in this uplifting nation. [ICON_BULLET]Your cities are more stable on the Revolution option. [ICON_BULLET]Slave Type Specialists gain a Food each because they spend more of their time gardening for the community. [ICON_BULLET]Citizen and Slave Type Specialists gain a Gold. [ICON_BULLET]Doctor Type Specialists gain an additional Research. [ICON_BULLET]Your Largest cities are Happier because you are able to reach more people in need with support programs in the largest urban centers. [ICON_BULLET]You gain a Diplomatic bonus for being well known to have good intentions. [ICON_BULLET]Your cities enjoy somewhat reduced Crime levels. [ICON_BULLET]Your cities enjoy somewhat reduced Disease levels. Penalties: [ICON_BULLET]Generic Upkeep is moderately higher as it can be expensive ensuring the adequate care of all citizens. [ICON_BULLET]Slave Type Specialists lose a Production each because they spend more of their time gardening for the community. [ICON_BULLET]Military Training Type Specialists cost a Culture each. [ICON_BULLET]This nation suffers from significantly more War Weariness because they value well-being and care about people. [ICON_BULLET]You can draft a few less citizens than normal with a conscript action. [ICON_BULLET]Your Military units take longer to train because many of your people are squeamish about violence and require more conditioning than normal. [ICON_BULLET]Your cities resent being whipped to rush construction and training significantly longer than normal.

TEXT.English: Humanitarian III

TEXT.English: Positive Trait "Kindness and compassion are not optional. To be otherwise is to make all achievement worthless. Our people will be well taken care of and all others will envy this treatment." This truly good person is a Leader many would love to live under. His nation is well cared for and nurtured and he spends time considering how to make life better and longer for the citizens in his charge. As a result, the whole culture of the nation comes together in support of one another. They aren't very willing warriors, but if they do go to war, as it is sometimes necessary, they make sure to have the most competent sources of healing support available at the front. It can also be a little expensive to run a country this way, but usually a lot more population can be supported, which can make up for the costs. Primary Benefits: [ICON_BULLET]Your Cities are incredibly Healthier. [ICON_BULLET]Your cities are all much Happier knowing their Leader truly cares for their well-being. Side Benefits: [ICON_BULLET]Great People are born much faster in this uplifting nation. [ICON_BULLET]Your cities are more stable on the Revolution option. [ICON_BULLET]Citizen Type Specialists gain a Food each because they spend more of their time gardening for the community. [ICON_BULLET]Citizen and Slave Type Specialists gain a Research. [ICON_BULLET]Doctor Type Specialists gain an additional Espionage. [ICON_BULLET]Your Largest cities are Happier because you are able to reach more people in need with support programs in the largest urban centers. [ICON_BULLET]You gain a Diplomatic bonus for being well known to have good intentions. [ICON_BULLET]Your cities enjoy somewhat reduced Crime levels. [ICON_BULLET]Your cities enjoy somewhat reduced Disease levels. Penalties: [ICON_BULLET]Generic Upkeep is significantly higher as it can be expensive ensuring the adequate care of all citizens. [ICON_BULLET]Citizen Type Specialists lose a Production each because they spend more of their time gardening for the community. [ICON_BULLET]Military Training Type Specialists cost a Gold each. [ICON_BULLET]This nation suffers from much more War Weariness because they value well-being and care about people. [ICON_BULLET]You can draft a few less citizens than normal with a conscript action. [ICON_BULLET]Your Military units take significantly longer to train because many of your people are squeamish about violence and require more conditioning than normal.

TEXT.English: Strong Happiness and Health and well insulated against revolution and reduces both Crime and Disease. Powerful Healers. Takes a slight production hit for redirected efforts of kindness.
TEXT.French: Fort bonheur et santé et bien isolé contre la révolution et réduit à la fois le Crime et les maladies. Guérisseurs puissants. Prend un léger coup de production pour rediriger les efforts de gentillesse.

TEXT.English: Hunter-Gatherer CT
TEXT.Polish: £owca-Zbieracz CT

TEXT.English: Hunter-Gatherer I
TEXT.Polish: £owca-zbieracz I

TEXT.English: Negative Trait "We were meant to live simply. Throwing off the balance of nature by trying to become more than our natural selves is bound to have severe and serious consequences. We must stay as simple and in harmony as possible, using only what we need and living only in the now." His heart is in the right place in thinking that Humankind is likely to eventually destroy itself and its planet by its own nature. Therefore urges his people to live simply, don't try to overly compete with one another and other nations, and treat the Earth with respect. While this may be a very good person, he doesn't make a solid competitor. Primary Penalties: [ICON_BULLET]Your cities produce a percentage less Gold, Research, Culture and Espionage. [ICON_BULLET]Your cities produce a percentage less Production. Secondary Penalties: [ICON_BULLET]Great People are slower to be born here due to competition being frowned upon. TEXT.English: Hunter-Gatherer II
TEXT.Polish: £owca-zbieracz II

TEXT.English: Negative Trait "We were meant to live simply. Throwing off the balance of nature by trying to become more than our natural selves is bound to have severe and serious consequences. We must stay as simple and in harmony as possible, using only what we need and living only in the now." His heart is in the right place in thinking that Humankind is likely to eventually destroy itself and its planet by its own nature. Therefore urges his people to live simply, don't try to overly compete with one another and other nations, and treat the Earth with respect. While this may be a very good person, he doesn't make a solid competitor. Primary Penalties: [ICON_BULLET]Your cities produce a percentage less Research and Culture. [ICON_BULLET]Your cities produce a percentage less Production. Secondary Penalties: [ICON_BULLET]Great People are significantly slower to be born here due to competition being frowned upon. [ICON_BULLET]All Wonder Types are significantly slower to be constructed since this Leader does not prioritize anything that will make his nation stand out. [ICON_BULLET]Your cities generate one less Gold and Espionage. [ICON_BULLET]Your cities generate one less Production. [ICON_BULLET]Improvements are far slower to naturally upgrade since there is natural reluctance among the people to update to the latest Technologies. [ICON_BULLET]Upkeep from the Number of Cities in your empire is significantly higher. It costs more to minimize the impact of Humanity in a larger empire. [ICON_BULLET]Your largest cities are less Happy since urban living is more fast-paced than your people prefer. [ICON_BULLET]Your cities suffer from a strong penalty to Education. While those Researchers on the cutting edge aren't begrudged, most people prefer to let it all go over their heads. Benefits: [ICON_BULLET]Your citizens are Happier with their simplified lives. [ICON_BULLET]Your citizens are Healthier in this society that values organic living. [ICON_BULLET]Your cities generate one more Food. [ICON_BULLET]Your cities all gain a percentage modifier to Food. [ICON_BULLET]Your cities benefit from reductions in both Air and Water Pollution.

TEXT.English: A very humble Leader who wishes to minimize the impact of his Civilization. You will receive less Great People, Slower Wonders, less Commerce, less Education, and less Production but a bit more Food and reduced Pollution.
TEXT.French: Un Leader très humble qui souhaite minimiser l'impact de sa civilisation. Moins de gens formidables, des merveilles plus lentes, moins de Commerce et de production mais un peu plus de nourriture et une Pollution réduite. Moins d'éducation.

TEXT.English: Idealistic CT
TEXT.Polish: Idealistyczny CT

TEXT.English: Idealistic I
TEXT.Polish: Idealistyczny I

TEXT.English: Negative Trait "There's no problems in MY empire! Everything's rosy over here! I'm quite certain everything is going perfectly according to plan..." Some people believe that if they imagine problems away, they won't really exist. That's how this Leader approaches challenges, and as a result, he runs an inefficient empire. He takes major upkeep hits for letting the organization go lax. The rosy attitude does well in diplomacy and often promotes a view on war that everything's going just fine (even when its not but it helps the public morale) and lackadaisical approach to assigning policies streamlines Anarchy times. Primary Penalties: [ICON_BULLET]Your Cities all suffer a minor percentage penalty to Food, Production, and Commerce. [ICON_BULLET]Your Cities all suffer a minor percentage penalty to Gold, Research, Culture, and Espionage. Side Penalties: [ICON_BULLET]Your units are more lackadaisically trained and start with a one less Experience Point. [ICON_BULLET]Your cities are a little less defended since dangers are ignored. [ICON_BULLET]Your cities suffer a touch more Crime. [ICON_BULLET]Your cities suffer a touch more Disease. [ICON_BULLET]Your cities struggle with a tiny bit less Education. Benefits: [ICON_BULLET]Your cities are all Happier since the Leader always paints a pretty picture of how things are. [ICON_BULLET]Overall Upkeep is reduced because this Leader tends to underspend with the optimism that problems will take care of themselves. [ICON_BULLET]Maintenance from Distance to Capital is lower. [ICON_BULLET]Maintenance from Number of Cities is lower. [ICON_BULLET]Corporation Maintenance is lower. [ICON_BULLET]Your largest cities are Happier because you like to heap praise on your leading metropolitan centers. [ICON_BULLET]Your Military units are slightly faster to train since training isn't taken as seriously.

[ICON_BULLET]Wasze miasta cierpi¹ z powodu nieco wiêkszej liczby chorób. [ICON_BULLET]Wasze miasta borykaj¹ siê z odrobinê mniejsz¹ edukacj¹. [ICON_BULLET]Twoje najwiêksze miasta s¹ szczêœliwsze, poniewa¿ lubisz chwaliæ swoje wiod¹ce oœrodki metropolitalne. [ICON_BULLET]Twoje jednostki wojskowe s¹ nieco szybsze w szkoleniu, poniewa¿ nie bior¹ udzia³u w szkoleniu na powa¿nie.

TEXT.English: Idealistic III
TEXT.Polish: Idealistyczny III

TEXT.English: Negative Trait "There's no problems in MY empire! Everything's rosy over here! I'm quite certain everything is going perfectly according to plan..." Some people believe that if they imagine problems away, they won't really exist. That's how this Leader approaches challenges, and as a result, he runs an inefficient empire. He takes major upkeep hits for letting the organization go lax. The rosy attitude does well in diplomacy and often promotes a view on war that everything's going just fine (even when its not but it helps the public morale) and lackadaisical approach to assigning policies streamlines Anarchy times. Primary Penalties: [ICON_BULLET]Your Cities all suffer a percentage penalty to Food, Production, and Commerce. [ICON_BULLET]Your Cities all suffer a percentage penalty to Gold, Research, Culture, and Espionage. Side Penalties: [ICON_BULLET]Your units are more lackadaisically trained and start with a few less Experience Points. [ICON_BULLET]Your cities are less defended since dangers are ignored. [ICON_BULLET]Your cities suffer a touch more Crime. [ICON_BULLET]Your cities suffer a touch more Disease. [ICON_BULLET]Your cities struggle with a tiny bit less Education. Benefits: [ICON_BULLET]Your cities are all Happier since the Leader always paints a pretty picture of how things are. [ICON_BULLET]Overall Upkeep is reduced because this Leader tends to underspend with the optimism that problems will take care of themselves. [ICON_BULLET]Maintenance from Distance to Capital is lower. [ICON_BULLET]Maintenance from Number of Cities is lower. [ICON_BULLET]Corporation Maintenance is lower. [ICON_BULLET]Your largest cities are Happier because you like to heap praise on your leading metropolitan centers. [ICON_BULLET]Your Military units are faster to train since training isn't taken as seriously.

TEXT.English: Suffers penalties in almost all areas but minor ones, and gains a few benefits in the process, such as in diplomacy and Happiness.
TEXT.French: Subit des pénalités dans presque tous les domaines sauf les mineurs, et gagne quelques avantages dans le processus, comme dans la diplomatie et le bonheur.

TEXT.Polish: Cierpi niewielkie kary w prawie wszystkich obszarach, i zyskuje przy tym kilka korzyœci, takich jak dyplomacja i szczêœcie.

TEXT.English: Imperialist CT
TEXT.Polish: Imperialistyczny CT

TEXT.English: Imperialist I
TEXT.Polish: Imperialistyczny I

TEXT.English: Positive Trait "Take what they have and make it your own. Establish proper governance in the foreign lands and the world falls like dominoes at your feet." With this Leader, you may wish to let your neighbors expand and place their cities and grow while you focus instead on developing a devastating city attack force to take all their achievements right out from underneath them. Your people are envious and savagely willing and empowered to act on your goals of conquest. Primary Benefits: [ICON_BULLET]Free Imperial I Promotion to all Combatant units. Strong city attack modifier and some side benefits that help your units maintain new cities. Unique Abilities: [ICON_BULLET]Whenever you capture a city you instantly get a number of free defenders drafted from the population of that city, based on the number of citizens you can conscript. Side Benefits: [ICON_BULLET]Your cities construct Siege based and Siege supporting buildings faster. [ICON_BULLET]Great Military People Specialists gain an additional Commerce. [ICON_BULLET]Techs that support and unlock Siege units are faster to Research. [ICON_BULLET]Siege units gain extra free Experience. [ICON_BULLET]Siege units are faster to train. [ICON_BULLET]Increase to the maximum number of population you convert to units during a Conscription action in a city. [ICON_BULLET]Lower Maintenance costs from Distance to Capital. Planning to conquer so much territory, your people are more efficient at maintaining larger empires with larger areas. [ICON_BULLET]Lower Maintenance costs from Number of Cities. [ICON_BULLET]Gain a bonus amount of Free Military Units from the total population of your nation. [ICON_BULLET]Your units gain more Experience when trained in your Capital. Your seat of power is the beating heart of the will to dominate all foes. [ICON_BULLET]Your units are more likely to capture defeated enemy units due to their practice at establishing dominance and control over the defeated. [ICON_BULLET]Your units are less likely to be captured when defeated because they are too used to being dominant and cannot stand the idea of such submission. Penalties: [ICON_BULLET]Slightly reduced rate of birthing Great People since your culture is so focused on taking the achievements of others they tend to undervalue personal achievements. [ICON_BULLET]Takes a diplomatic penalty because few foreign powers are comfortable knowing that this Leader's goal is to take over the world. [ICON_BULLET]Units are slightly more expensive to upgrade because keeping up on the specialized invasion training can get costly. [ICON_BULLET]Crime is more difficult to control since so many among your society feel dominated and resentful of it.

[ICON_BULLET]Ulepszanie jednostek jest nieco dro¿sze, poniewa¿ kontynuowanie specjalistycznego szkolenia w zakresie inwazji mo¿e byæ kosztowne. [ICON_BULLET]Przestêpczoœæ jest trudniejsza do kontrolowania, poniewa¿ tak wielu cz³onków twojego spo³eczeñstwa czuje siê zdominowanych i ura¿onych z tego powodu.

[ICON_BULLET]Przestêpczoœæ jest trudniejsza do kontrolowania, poniewa¿ tak wielu cz³onków twojego spo³eczeñstwa czuje siê zdominowanych i ura¿onych z tego powodu.

TEXT.English: Imperialist III
TEXT.Polish: Imperialistyczny III

TEXT.English: Positive Trait "Take what they have and make it your own. Establish proper governance in the foreign lands and the world falls like dominoes at your feet." With this Leader, you may wish to let your neighbors expand and place their cities and grow while you focus instead on developing a devastating city attack force to take all their achievements right out from underneath them. Your people are envious and savagely willing and empowered to act on your goals of conquest. Primary Benefits: [ICON_BULLET]Free Imperial III Promotion to all Combatant units. Strong city attack modifier and some side benefits that help your units maintain new cities. Side Benefits: [ICON_BULLET]Your cities construct Siege based and Siege supporting buildings faster. [ICON_BULLET]Techs that support and unlock Siege units are faster to Research. [ICON_BULLET]Siege units gain extra free Experience. [ICON_BULLET]Siege units are faster to train. [ICON_BULLET]Huge increase to the maximum number of population you convert to units during a Conscription action in a city. [ICON_BULLET]Much Lower Maintenance costs from Distance to Capital. Planning to conquer so much territory, your people are more efficient at maintaining larger empires with larger areas. [ICON_BULLET]Much Lower Maintenance costs from Number of Cities. [ICON_BULLET]Gain a bonus amount of Free Military Units from the total population of your nation. [ICON_BULLET]Each military unit you staff in a city makes your citizens Happier. It proves your power to command is unquestionable. [ICON_BULLET]Your units gain more Experience when trained in your Capital. Your seat of power is the beating heart of the will to dominate all foes. [ICON_BULLET]Your units are much more likely to capture defeated enemy units due to their practice at establishing dominance and control over the defeated. [ICON_BULLET]Your units are less likely to be captured when defeated because they are too used to being dominant and cannot stand the idea of such submission. Penalties: [ICON_BULLET]Significantly reduced rate of birthing Great People since your culture is so focused on taking the achievements of others they tend to undervalue personal achievements. [ICON_BULLET]Takes a diplomatic penalty because few foreign powers are comfortable knowing that this Leader's goal is to take over the world. [ICON_BULLET]Units are significantly more expensive to upgrade because keeping up on the specialized invasion training can get costly. [ICON_BULLET]Crime is more difficult to control since so many among your society feel dominated and resentful of it.

Strong city attack modifier and a reduction in Crime and the chance of revolt wherever the unit is stationed. Side Benefits: [ICON_BULLET]Your cities construct Siege based and Siege supporting buildings faster. [ICON_BULLET]Great Military People Specialists gain an additional Commerce. [ICON_BULLET]Gain a bonus amount of Free Military Units from the total population of your nation. [ICON_BULLET]Each military unit you staff in a city makes your citizens Happier. [ICON_BULLET]Your units are somewhat less likely to be captured when defeated because they are too used to being dominant and cannot stand the idea of such submission. Penalties: [ICON_BULLET]Reduced rate of birthing Great People since your culture is so focused on taking the achievements of others they tend to undervalue personal achievements. [ICON_BULLET]Takes a diplomatic penalty because few foreign powers are comfortable knowing that this Leader's goal is to take over the world. [ICON_BULLET]Units are more expensive to upgrade because keeping up on the specialized invasion training can get costly. [ICON_BULLET]Crime is significantly more difficult to control since so many among your society feel dominated and resentful of it.

TEXT.Polish: Silne si³y atakuj¹ce miasta i rz¹d dobrze zorganizowany na podbój.

TEXT.English: Industrious CT
TEXT.Polish: Przemys³owy CT

TEXT.English: Industrious I
TEXT.Polish: Przemys³owy I

TEXT.English: Positive Trait "Industry drives the strength of the nation." This Leader considers productivity to be the highest priority a nation can have and does all he can to drive his people to greater industrial achievement. Like any of the yield and Commerce focused traits, it's a simple strategy, but shockingly effective. Primary Benefits: [ICON_BULLET]An additional Production is generated by any plot that generates as much as 7 or more. [ICON_BULLET]All cities gain an additional base Production. [ICON_BULLET]All cities gain a percentage modifier to Production. Side Benefits: [ICON_BULLET]Production focused Improvements generate an additional Production. [ICON_BULLET]Production focused Improvements upgrade twice as fast as normal. [ICON_BULLET]Production focused Improvements are much faster for your to build. [ICON_BULLET]Engineer, Citizen, and Slave type Specialists generate an additional Production. [ICON_BULLET]Techs that bring Improvements to industry are faster to Research. [ICON_BULLET]Your are faster at building Improvements overall. [ICON_BULLET]Great Engineers are more likely to be born. Penalties: [ICON_BULLET]Less Health in each city since heavier industry often invites more injury causing accidents. [ICON_BULLET]Engineer, Citizen, and Slave type Specialists generate one less Gold. [ICON_BULLET]Suffers a bit more Air Pollution. [ICON_BULLET]Suffers a bit more Water Pollution.
TEXT.Polish: Pozytywna cecha "Przemys³ jest si³¹ napêdow¹ narodu." Ten przywódca uwa¿a produktywnoœæ za najwy¿szy priorytet, jaki mo¿e mieæ naród i robi wszystko, co w jego mocy, aby doprowadziæ swoich ludzi do wiêkszych osi¹gniêæ przemys³owych. Jak ka¿da cecha skupiaj¹ca siê na plonach i handlu, jest to prosta strategia, ale szokuj¹co skuteczna. Podstawowe korzyœci: [ICON_BULLET]Dodatkowa produkcja jest generowana przez ka¿de pole, które generuje ju¿ 7 lub wiêcej. [ICON_BULLET]Wszystkie miasta zyskuj¹ dodatkow¹ podstawow¹ produkcjê. [ICON_BULLET]Wszystkie miasta zyskuj¹ procentowy modyfikator do Produkcji. Korzyœci dodatkowe: [ICON_BULLET]Ulepszenia zorientowane na produkcjê generuj¹ dodatkow¹ produkcjê. Ulepszenia ukierunkowane na produkcjê ulepszaj¹ siê dwa razy szybciej ni¿ normalnie. [ICON_BULLET]Twoi pracownicy mog¹ budowaæ ulepszenia zorientowane na produkcjê znacznie szybciej. [ICON_BULLET]In¿ynier, Obywatel i Niewolnik generuj¹ dodatkow¹ produkcjê. [ICON_BULLET]Technologie, które wprowadzaj¹ ulepszenia w przemyœle, s¹ szybciej badane. [ICON_BULLET]Twoi pracownicy ogólnie szybciej buduj¹ ulepszenia. [ICON_BULLET]Prawdopodobieñstwo urodzenia siê wielkich in¿ynierów jest wiêksze. Kary: [ICON_BULLET]Mniej zdrowia w ka¿dym mieœcie, poniewa¿ ciê¿szy przemys³ czêsto powoduje wiêcej wypadków. [ICON_BULLET]Specjaliœci typu In¿ynier, Obywatel i Niewolnik generuj¹ o jedno Z³oto mniej. [ICON_BULLET]Twoje miasta cierpi¹ nieco wiêcej zanieczyszczenia powietrza. [ICON_BULLET]Twoje miasta cierpi¹ nieco wiêcej zanieczyszczenia wody.

Penalties: [ICON_BULLET]Less Health in each city since heavier industry often invites more injury causing accidents. [ICON_BULLET]Less Happiness in each city since harder, longer work dulls the enjoyment in life. [ICON_BULLET]Engineer, Citizen, and Slave type Specialists generate one less Gold. [ICON_BULLET]Suffers more Air Pollution. [ICON_BULLET]Suffers more Water Pollution.

TEXT.English: Strong production. Toil makes less Happy folk though.
TEXT.French: Forte production. Mais le travail rend les gens moins heureux.

TEXT.English: Innovative CT
TEXT.Polish: Innowacyjny CT

TEXT.English: Innovative I
TEXT.Polish: Innowacyjny I

TEXT.English: Positive Trait "Our nation should be a forerunner, creating and discovering new and valuable things to share with the rest of the world at a profit." Previously known as 'Progressist', this Leader is enamored by new things and quickly tires of 'yesterday's news'. This can be problematic for the Leader on an interpersonal level but it serves his people rather well, who are inspired to press the bounds of known design and function and to apply the latest developments as quickly as they can nation-wide. As a result, the nation always has neat things to Trade to other countries and between its own cities, and its always on the lookout for a way to impress the world with new wondrous things, including buildings. All this does enhance the overall upkeep expenses a bit. The Leader and his people can also suffer some from impatience. Primary Benefits: [ICON_BULLET]All cities gain a percentage modifier to Research and Culture. [ICON_BULLET]All cities gain a percentage modifier to Production and Commerce. Unique Benefits: [ICON_BULLET]Your units can upgrade wherever they are as long as they do have access where they are to any required buildings and resources. Side Benefits: [ICON_BULLET]All cities gain an additional base Research and Culture. [ICON_BULLET]All cities gain an additional base Production and Commerce. Penalties: [ICON_BULLET]Overall Upkeep is higher as operating a nation on the constant cutting edge makes for an expensive policy. [ICON_BULLET]National Wonders are slower to be constructed since they aren't as impressive since all nations can get something like it. [ICON_BULLET]Your nation accumulates War Weariness faster since war can distract from innovation. [ICON_BULLET]Anarchy time when changing Civics is a little longer since the impatience your people have for policy changes, and the constant suggestion of new ways to address little issues that a new policy introduces, adds to the frustration to getting things smoothed out. [ICON_BULLET]Improvements upgrade much slower than normal because the people are impatiently waiting for to get it done immediately rather than taking the time themselves to update the land they operate themselves. [ICON_BULLET]Workers are a bit slower because they are always looking for ways to do things in a new and improved fashion and have a hard time focusing on repetitive processes involved in getting things done. [ICON_BULLET]Your nation gets fewer base free military units because even your soldiers balk at getting hand-me-down equipment. [ICON_BULLET]The constant need to make sure that everything is as fully considered for new adjustments during times of policy change ensures that any Anarchy Period takes at least a round at minimum, which may be adjusted by game speed.
TEXT.Polish: Pozytywna cecha "Nasz naród powinien byæ prekursorem, tworz¹cym i odkrywaj¹cym nowe i cenne rzeczy, którymi mo¿na dzieliæ siê z reszt¹ œwiata z zyskiem." TEXT.English: Takes advantage of Trade to improve Espionage and is compelled to stay on the tech forefront.
TEXT.French: Profite du Commerce pour améliorer l'espionnage et est obligé de rester à la pointe de la technologie.
TEXT.Russian: Èñïîëüçóåò òîðãîâëþ äëÿ óëó÷øåíèÿ øïèîíàæà è âûíóæäåí îñòàâàòüñÿ íà ïåðåäíåì êðàå òåõíîëîãèé.
TEXT.Polish: Wykorzystuje handel do usprawnienia szpiegostwa i jest zmuszony pozostaæ w czo³ówce technologii.

TEXT.English: Isolationist CT
TEXT.Polish: Izolacjonistyczny CT

TEXT.English: Isolationist I
TEXT.Polish: Izolacjonistyczny I

TEXT.English: Negative Trait "All those other nations are only out to take advantage of us and even their trades are barbed with deception and entrapment!" Some nations throughout history have thrived with a xenophobic focus on themselves and internal matters and doing their best to block out the rest of the world and its affairs. This Leader certainly tries this approach as much as possible and has convinced his people to adopt similar views. They frown on travel and tourism and are a defensive breed. This serves them in many ways but also impedes the nation from benefiting much from Trade. Primary Penalties: [ICON_BULLET]All Trade Routes are significantly less productive with yields generated. [ICON_BULLET]Your cities may maintain one less Trade Route than the normal limit. [ICON_BULLET]All Foreign Trade Routes are even less productive with yields generated. Side Penalties: [ICON_BULLET]Merchant Type Specialists generate one less Commerce. [ICON_BULLET]Trade Units are trained with one less Experience Point. [ICON_BULLET]Trade Units are trained slower. [ICON_BULLET]Civic changes cause more rounds of Anarchy as cooperation is not a cultural strong suit here. [ICON_BULLET]Maintenance from Distance to Capital is increased since your people don't like to travel. [ICON_BULLET]Maintenance from the Number of Cities is increased since your people prefer a smaller nation with fewer cultural differences and the wider they are spread, the more they conflict internally, leading to unique support costs. [ICON_BULLET]Each of your cities lose a Trade Route. [ICON_BULLET]You gain a Diplomatic penalty with other Leaders since you simply don't like spending time with them and would prefer they stay home rather than visit. [ICON_BULLET]Loses some Tourism in all your cities. Benefits: [ICON_BULLET]Great Generals are faster to emerge from battles in your borders since your people are more deeply offended by intrusions. [ICON_BULLET]National Wonders are faster to construct since anything intended to support the nation is a higher priority than usual. [ICON_BULLET]An additional citizen may be drafted during a conscription action. [ICON_BULLET]Your units gain more Experience during combat inside your borders since your people are highly territorial. [ICON_BULLET]Cities have higher City Defense levels since they are cleverly designed to keep others out. [ICON_BULLET]Your cities are harder to perform Espionage Missions in for your enemies. Your xenophobic citizens rarely offer any trust to outsiders.
TEXT.Polish: Negatywna cecha: "Wszystkie inne narody chc¹ nas tylko wykorzystaæ, nawet ich transakcje s¹ naznaczone oszustwami i pu³apkami!" Niektóre narody na przestrzeni dziejów prosperowa³y dziêki ksenofobicznemu skupieniu siê na sobie i sprawach wewnêtrznych i robieniu, co w ich mocy, aby blokowaæ reszta œwiata i ich sprawy. [ICON_BULLET]Jednostki handlowe s¹ szkolone wolniej [ICON_BULLET]Zmiany doktryn powoduj¹ wiêcej rund Anarchii, poniewa¿ wspó³praca nie jest tutaj mocn¹ stron¹. [ICON_BULLET]Zwiêksza siê koszt utrzymania w ramach odleg³oœci do stolicy, poniewa¿ twoi ludzie nie lubi¹ podró¿owaæ. [ICON_BULLET]Zwiêksza siê koszt utrzymania w oparciu o liczbê miast, poniewa¿ twoi ludzie wol¹ mniejszy naród z mniejszymi ró¿nicami kulturowymi i im bardziej s¹ rozsiani, tym bardziej s¹ wewnêtrznie sprzeczni, co prowadzi do unikalnych kosztów. [ICON_BULLET]Ka¿de z twoich miast traci szlak handlowy. [ICON_BULLET]Otrzymujesz karê dyplomatyczn¹ z innymi przywódcami, poniewa¿ po prostu nie lubisz spêdzaæ z nimi czasu i wolisz, ¿eby zostali raczej w domu. [ICON_BULLET]Cuda narodowe s¹ szybsze w budowie, poniewa¿ wszystko, co ma na celu wsparcie narodu, ma wy¿szy priorytet ni¿ zwykle. [ICON_BULLET]Podczas akcji poboru mo¿e zostaæ powo³any dodatkowy obywatel. [ICON_BULLET]Twoje jednostki zdobywaj¹ wiêcej doœwiadczenia podczas walki w twoich granicach, poniewa¿ twoi ludzie s¹ bardzo terytorialni. [ICON_BULLET]Miasta maj¹ wy¿szy poziom Obrony Miejskiej, poniewa¿ s¹ sprytnie zaprojektowane, aby chroniæ je od zewn¹trz. [ICON_BULLET]W twoich miastach trudniej jest wykonywaæ misje szpiegowskie dla wrogów. Twoi ksenofobscy obywatele rzadko obdarzaj¹ zaufaniem osoby z zewn¹trz.

TEXT.English: Takes serious Trade and diplomacy penalties but is a touch better internally.

TEXT.English: Megalomaniac CT
TEXT.Polish: Megalomañski CT

TEXT.English: Megalomaniac I
TEXT.Polish: Megalomañski I

TEXT.English: Negative Trait "I was born to rule the Earth! None shall stand in my way! Advisors? Bah! Nobody knows better than I!" Some of your people may be enamored with this Leader's unshakable projection of confidence. But one of the problems in the world is that stupid people have the confidence to take the lead while the intelligent ones are often too cautious with responsibility. This nation suffers from overspending and impulsiveness and an inability to get their Leader to see reason when it can be desperately important that he understands he doesn't have all the answers all the time. Intelligent people who live under this rule are deeply embarrassed by this Leader. Primary Penalties: [ICON_BULLET]All cities suffer a percentage penalty to Gold and Espionage. [ICON_BULLET]All cities suffer a percentage penalty to Food and Production. Side Penalties: [ICON_BULLET]Overall upkeep is a little increased due to unwise spending and policies. [ICON_BULLET]National Wonders and Team Projects are slower to construct since sharing in the glory of an accomplishment and construction projects that support local needs are not inspiring to this Leader. [ICON_BULLET]All cities suffer a reduction in base Gold and Espionage. [ICON_BULLET]All cities suffer a reduction in base Food and Production. [ICON_BULLET]Gains a penalty to Diplomacy. [ICON_BULLET]Your cities are easier to perform Espionage missions against since your Leader often publicizes secrets in the act of bragging. [ICON_BULLET]Your people take more time in resent for being whipped to rush constructions and training during slavery since many do not approve of the Leader's choices in the first place. [ICON_BULLET]Your cities suffer a little more from Crime since the people are resistant to this Leader's laws. Benefits: [ICON_BULLET]Great People are slightly faster to be born because the people are inspired to have confidence in themselves. [ICON_BULLET]Great Military People emerge slightly faster because the military gets frustrated with being led poorly so those who want to improve things rise to the occasion faster. [ICON_BULLET]World Wonders are faster to build since the Leader loves to budget for anything that assuages his ego. [ICON_BULLET]Anarchy time when changing Civics is significantly shorter since this Leader does not tolerate delays in his policy decisions. [ICON_BULLET]Military units are faster to train since the Leader pushes his training programs with immense impatience.

TEXT.English: Generically bad in almost all areas of governing. Bad investments due to arrogance (-Gold) and Intelligence advisors know they will not be heard (-Espionage).

TEXT.English: Nomadic CT
TEXT.Polish: Nomadyczny CT

TEXT.English: Nomadic I
TEXT.Polish: Nomadyczny I

TEXT.English: Positive Trait "Keep moving! Whether we are the cheetah or the gazelle, we run to survive. You can take whatever you want as long as you are faster than your opponent. Speed is key." Your Leader's wanderlust has driven its way into every corner of society, making your people highly mobile and thriving when they can stay on the move, but suffering when they must settle. They are more in touch with the land and seasons and love tending to herds and hunting for Food. Primary Benefits: [ICON_BULLET]Free Nomadic I Promotion for Explorers, Animals, Mounted, Trade, and Wheeled units. Gives enhanced land speed, terrain navigation and withdrawal skill. Side Benefits: [ICON_BULLET]Herding and hunting based buildings are faster to build. [ICON_BULLET]Camps, herding and hunting Improvements are more valuable. [ICON_BULLET]Animal qualifying Improvements are much faster to upgrade if they can. [ICON_BULLET]Animal qualifying Improvements are faster for to build. [ICON_BULLET]Great Hunter Specialists gain an additional Food yield. [ICON_BULLET]Great Hunter Specialists gain two additional Research. [ICON_BULLET]Techs that lead to Animal related or Speed related benefits are faster to discover. [ICON_BULLET]Explorer, Animal, Mounted and Wheeled units gain extra Experience points when trained. [ICON_BULLET]Explorer, Animal, Mounted and Wheeled units are faster to train. [ICON_BULLET]Less Distance to Capital upkeep. The speed at which your people travel reduces shipping costs. [ICON_BULLET]All cities gain an additional Trade Route thanks to the speed and efficiency with which your people make Trade journeys. [ICON_BULLET]Great Hunters are birthed faster. [ICON_BULLET]Many resources derived from land animal plots give extra Happiness in all your cities. Your people love the bounty of the land and maintaining Healthy wildlife populations. Penalties: [ICON_BULLET]Happiness penalty. It can be a hard life always being on the move and that gets to some at times. [ICON_BULLET]Plots that produce 5 Production or more generate one less. There's not as much concentrated focus on perfecting obtaining benefit from a given territory in less sedentary people. [ICON_BULLET]Techs that lead to more Sedentary specialized benefits like farming and mining are slower to discover. [ICON_BULLET]Higher Maintenance costs from Number of Cities. The more places there are in your nation, the more the infrastructure between them is of paramount importance to maintain to a high degree. [ICON_BULLET]Cities are harder to defend since people are more transient between them and don't place as much priority on local security measures.

Your Leader's wanderlust has driven its way into every corner of society, making your people highly mobile and thriving when they can stay on the move, but suffering when they must settle. They are more in touch with the land and seasons and love tending to herds and hunting for Food. Primary Benefits: [ICON_BULLET]Free Nomadic II Promotion for Explorers, Animals, Mounted, Trade, and Wheeled units. Gives enhanced withdrawal and vision range. [ICON_BULLET]All cities benefit from a higher Maximum cap on Trade Routes. Side Benefits: [ICON_BULLET]Herding and hunting based buildings are faster to build. [ICON_BULLET]Camps, herding and hunting Improvements are more valuable. [ICON_BULLET]Animal qualifying Improvements are much faster to upgrade if they can. [ICON_BULLET]Significantly less Distance to Capital upkeep. The speed at which your people travel reduces shipping costs. [ICON_BULLET]All cities gain an additional Trade Route thanks to the speed and efficiency with which your people make Trade journeys. [ICON_BULLET]Great Hunters are birthed significantly faster. Penalties: [ICON_BULLET]Happiness penalty. It can be a hard life always being on the move and that gets to some at times. [ICON_BULLET]Plots that produce 5 Food or more generate one less. There's not as much concentrated focus on perfecting obtaining benefit from a given territory in less sedentary people. [ICON_BULLET]Cities are harder to defend since people are more transient between them and don't place as much priority on local security measures.

There's not as much concentrated focus on perfecting obtaining benefit from a given territory in less sedentary people. [ICON_BULLET]Techs that lead to more Sedentary specialized benefits like farming and mining are slower to discover. [ICON_BULLET]Higher Maintenance costs from Number of Cities. The more places there are in your nation, the more the infrastructure between them is of paramount importance to maintain to a high degree. [ICON_BULLET]The largest cities in your nation are less Happy. Your people don't like being crowded into high density spaces. [ICON_BULLET]Cities are harder to defend since people are more transient between them and don't place as much priority on local security measures.

TEXT.English: Organized CT
TEXT.Polish: Zorganizowany CT

TEXT.English: Organized I
TEXT.Polish: Zorganizowany I

TEXT.English: Positive Trait "A well ordered hierarchy established throughout the nation will lead to streamlined efforts and balanced budgets." Everything is done in a careful and well planned manner here. This can slow things down but also leads to extreme efficiency in providing quality services to the nation. The most powerful aspect of this trait is how greatly it diminishes upkeep costs. Your military is a bit more restrained than it should be and therefore suffers for your organizational efforts. The longest projects are made faster with this approach and overall, more tends to get done by your people. Putting such a high value on planning and execution does diminish creativity some. Obviously some trying times of preparation can take longer since your government is instructed to do what it must to prepare for new ways to be introduced. Primary Benefits: [ICON_BULLET]Overall Upkeep is strongly reduced. [ICON_BULLET]All Specialists give an extra Production. [ICON_BULLET]Maintenance from Distance to Capital is tremendously diminished. [ICON_BULLET]Maintenance from Number of Cities is hugely reduced. Side Benefits: [ICON_BULLET]Team Projects are completed significantly faster since proper planning at the beginning of the project leads to efficiencies that help the project finish ahead of time. [ICON_BULLET]Improvements naturally upgrade far faster due to preparations for improvement being taken all along. [ICON_BULLET]Workers are much faster at building Improvements since things are well planned out before they even begin. [ICON_BULLET]You gain a number of Free Units that require no support. [ICON_BULLET]You gain yet more Free Units that require no support from a small percentage of your overall population. [ICON_BULLET]Your largest cities are Happier than normal due to impressive urban planning making life easier on its citizens. [ICON_BULLET]Military Units are faster to train because the training regimen is so well planned out. Penalties: [ICON_BULLET]It takes a bit more Experience for your units to level and thus gain Promotions. [ICON_BULLET]Great Military People are somewhat slower to emerge since your people rarely take inspired action without careful consideration. [ICON_BULLET]Artist and Slave type Specialists are less inspired so produce one less Culture each. [ICON_BULLET]Civic Anarchy time is longer due to the patient planning your Leader insists on being taken with any policy changes.

TEXT.English: Gains a highly lubricated government. Low upkeep and faster results. Leader and his followers are not as mentally agile so since war is chaotic it is irritating to the habit driven people, and it takes longer to reorganize the government properly after a change in policies.
TEXT.French: Obtient un gouvernement hautement lubrifié. Faible entretien et résultats plus rapides. Leader et ses partisans ne sont pas aussi agiles mentalement, donc comme la guerre est chaotique, elle est irritante pour les gens qui ont des habitudes, et il faut plus de temps pour réorganiser correctement le gouvernement après un changement de politique.

TEXT.English: Philosophical CT
TEXT.Polish: Filozoficzny CT

TEXT.English: Philosophical I
TEXT.Polish: Filozoficzny I

TEXT.English: Positive Trait "What is life for? Are we not here to discover our true purpose and live that purpose? We were all born for a reason, born to contribute something special. We should support and enable each other to bring each other's unique gifts to bear for the nation." Your Leader is a deep thinker who inspires the nation to produce individuals of the same nature. Some may suspect him of being a member of an elite secret society, and he may be. He certainly offers as much national support to the development of those with promise as he can. Unfortunately, smarter citizens are more likely to commit Crime, thinking it to be a Great way to test their intelligence against the system. Primary Benefits: [ICON_BULLET]Great People are born much faster in this nation. [ICON_BULLET]All cities gain a percentage modifier to Research and Gold. [ICON_BULLET]All Specialists produce an extra Commerce. Unique Benefits: [ICON_BULLET]Your cities get a Free Specialist for each National Wonder constructed there. Side Benefits: [ICON_BULLET]All cities get an additional base Research and Gold. [ICON_BULLET]Engineer Type Specialists give an extra Production. [ICON_BULLET]All cities get a few more Great People rate points each round, not dedicated to any particular type of Specialist. Penalties: [ICON_BULLET]Overall upkeep is higher due to some unusual programs supporting grants and other independent efforts that show promise. [ICON_BULLET]Citizen and Slave Type Specialists lose the extra Commerce all other Specialists give. [ICON_BULLET]Civic Anarchy periods last a little longer since more thought goes into trying to find the best ways to establish policy. [ICON_BULLET]The Unhappiness from whip rushing construction and training lasts longer here than normal. [ICON_BULLET]Since people here often try to take longer to establish themselves in their careers before forming families, cities take more Food to grow. [ICON_BULLET]Your cities suffer from extra Crime rates since even those with criminal minds feel empowered to find their calling as well.

TEXT.English: Politician CT
TEXT.Polish: Polityczny CT

TEXT.English: Politician I
TEXT.Polish: Polityczny I

TEXT.English: Positive Trait "Government is a complex machine, which requires constant tweaking and adjusting to get the best performance. The most adaptable government will survive." If you really hate Anarchy periods after changing Civics, this is your go-to pick. And although you will have very strong culture and Espionage, you will also suffer from greatly increased Maintenance struggles. Diplomacy with other Leaders is also a strong suit. Primary Benefits: [ICON_BULLET]All cities gain a percentage modifier to Culture and Espionage. [ICON_BULLET]Anarchy Time from changing Civics is dramatically reduced. [ICON_BULLET]Units trained in the Capital gain a percentage adjustment to their starting Experience Points. Side Benefits: [ICON_BULLET]National Wonders are constructed significantly faster since they are a reflection of good governing. [ICON_BULLET]All cities gain an extra base Culture and Espionage. [ICON_BULLET]Your Capital gets a small percentage bonus to Food, Production and Commerce. [ICON_BULLET]Spy Type Specialists gain an extra Espionage. [ICON_BULLET]Your Capital gains a percentage modifier to Culture and Espionage. [ICON_BULLET]You gain a Diplomatic bonus. Penalties: [ICON_BULLET]General Upkeep is significantly higher since this Leader finds it very important to uphold all of his many promises to his people. [ICON_BULLET]World Wonders are significantly slower to construct since such projects are always secondary in priority to more local needs being met first. [ICON_BULLET]War Weariness accumulates faster for this nation, which likes to believe that proper governing involves avoiding warfare. [ICON_BULLET]Maintenance from Distance to Palace is higher due to never shortcutting on costs to keep the government running at peak condition. [ICON_BULLET]Maintenance from Number of Cities is higher since the costs normally associated with this upkeep are intensified by attempts to spare no expense for quality results. [ICON_BULLET]This nation suffers a small Education penalty. True politicians are a little too aware that citizens are more easily swayed when not as Educated.

TEXT.English: Very good at minimizing/eliminating Anarchy from Civic changes. Good diplomacy and is compelled to present the nation as a Leader on the international scene (+culture) and is savvy of other Leader's machinations (+Espionage). Spends more on upkeep to ensure the best possible governmental functioning.
TEXT.French: Très bon pour minimiser / éliminer l'anarchie des changements civiques. Bonne diplomatie et est obligé de présenter la nation comme un Leader sur la scène internationale (+ culture) et est averti des machinations des autres Leaders (+ espionnage). Dépense davantage pour l'entretien afin d'assurer le meilleur fonctionnement gouvernemental possible.

Dobra dyplomacja, ma obowi¹zek przedstawiania narodu jako lidera na scenie miêdzynarodowej (+kultura) i jest œwiadomy machinacji innych przywódców (+szpiegostwo). Wydaje wiêcej na utrzymanie, aby zapewniæ mo¿liwie najlepsze funkcjonowanie rz¹du.

TEXT.English: Populist CT
TEXT.Polish: Populistyczny CT

TEXT.English: Populist I
TEXT.Polish: Populistyczny I

TEXT.English: Negative Trait "Societal elite are all in cahoots with each other forming a master plot to take over all sovereign nations for themselves and only I seem to understand this!" It may seem strange that any Leader would want to ensure that people in his society don't try to stand out as strongly valuable contributors but when people of high quality come under immediate suspicion of being potential threats, rivals, and conspirators, folks tend to keep a low profile and achieve more silently if at all. That's what happens in this Leader's nation, but on the plus side, the truly common person actually does benefit a bit more from some of the programs designed to benefit the masses, so long as they stay in their lanes. Primary Penalties: [ICON_BULLET]Great People are born much slower in this nation. [ICON_BULLET]All cities suffer a percentage penalty to Research and Gold. [ICON_BULLET]All Specialists cost one Commerce. Side Penalties: [ICON_BULLET]All cities get a reduction in base Research and Gold. [ICON_BULLET]Engineer Type Specialists lose a Production. [ICON_BULLET]All cities get one less Free Specialist. Nobody wants to stand out for doing more than their fair share. [ICON_BULLET]All cities have their Great People accumulation points reduced by a few. [ICON_BULLET]Education levels are somewhat penalized. Your citizens are conditioned to feel that being overly educated is a form of arrogance that attracts the wrong kind of attention. Benefits: [ICON_BULLET]General Upkeep is reduced since the funds usually channeled to elite members of society and Education grants are withheld. [ICON_BULLET]Citizen and Slave Type Specialists gain back the Commerce all other Specialists lose. [ICON_BULLET]Civic Anarchy periods don't last quite as long since fewer people feel they should contribute to the policy debates. [ICON_BULLET]You can draft an extra citizen than normal since people are Happy to abandon individualism to be a part of something greater than themselves. [ICON_BULLET]Your largest cities are a bit Happier since urban living allows folks to blend into the crowd more easily. [ICON_BULLET]Your cities require a little less Food to grow as your citizens tend to have larger families. The more the merrier. [ICON_BULLET]Your cities suffer from somewhat reduced Crime levels.

TEXT.English: Great People rates and Specialists are impacted heavily here. Experts are disdained (-Research) and the Wealthy are compelled to keep a low profile (-Gold) but this keeps government streamlined for the people's needs somewhat.
TEXT.French: Taux des Personnages illustres et des spécialistes sont fortement impactés ici. Les experts sont dédaignés (-Recherche) et les riches sont obligés de garder un profil bas (-Or) mais cela maintient le gouvernement rationalisé pour les besoins des gens quelque peu.

TEXT.Polish: Przyrost Wielkich Ludzi oraz specjaliœci znacznie cierpi¹. Eksperci s¹ pogardzani (-Badania), a Bogaci s¹ zmuszeni zachowaæ dyskrecjê (-Z³oto), ale to pozwala w pewnym stopniu dostosowaæ rz¹d do potrzeb ludzi.
