He pushes his people hard to find Great accomplishments but cuts some corners on some things to achieve this, like Trade investments. Any buildings and techs that increase productivity are faster to come together as they get higher priority resources. Units are trained with a little less quality. Primary Benefits: [ICON_BULLET]World Wonders, National Wonders, and Team Projects are constructed significantly faster than usual. [ICON_BULLET]Rushing construction and training costs much less than normal. Unique Benefits: [ICON_BULLET]Buildings that speed up construction and training are constructed faster. [ICON_BULLET]Techs that give benefits for being first to Research them are discovered faster. Side Benefits: [ICON_BULLET]Civic Anarchy periods don't last nearly as long because your Leader more rapidly addresses the problems with new policy shifts. [ICON_BULLET]Improvements naturally upgrade twice as fast. [ICON_BULLET]Workers are much faster than normal. [ICON_BULLET]Your people are more efficient at their jobs and thus you gain a Free Specialist in all cities to represent that added amount of labor. [ICON_BULLET]Military Units are significantly faster to train due to streamlined training regimens. [ICON_BULLET]The people are faster to forgive whipping to rush construction and training. [ICON_BULLET]Units are significantly cheaper to upgrade since they are faster to learn new ways to fight. Penalties: [ICON_BULLET]Trade Route profits are reduced for Production yields. [ICON_BULLET]This nation suffers significantly more from War Weariness since war slows down development projects and enhances achievement stress. [ICON_BULLET]Units begin with one less Experience Point due to streamlined training procedures. [ICON_BULLET]Your nation naturally supports a reduced amount of Free Units based on a small percentage of the overall total population. [ICON_BULLET]Your cities are harder to defend since they are built for efficiency rather than holding invaders out. [ICON_BULLET]Golden Ages don't last as long because people get back to a sense of normal faster.

TEXT.English: Positive Trait "I push my nation to operate as quickly as it can, for there is much work to be done. We will take the initiative and beat all others to the goals only one may ever obtain. I have many plans and goals and all of them build onto one another, are interconnected. So many working parts and I keep them all spinning. I WILL leave a legacy!" The goal of this Leader is for he and his people to leave behind as incredible a legacy as possible in the amount of time he has to achieve it. He pushes his people hard to find Great accomplishments but cuts some corners on some things to achieve this, like Trade investments. Any buildings and techs that increase productivity are faster to come together as they get higher priority resources. Units are trained with a little less quality. Primary Benefits: [ICON_BULLET]World Wonders, National Wonders, and Team Projects are constructed far faster than usual. [ICON_BULLET]Rushing construction and training costs half as much as normal. Unique Benefits: [ICON_BULLET]Buildings that speed up construction and training are constructed faster. [ICON_BULLET]Techs that give benefits for being first to Research them are discovered faster. Side Benefits: [ICON_BULLET]Civic Anarchy periods don't last as long because your Leader more rapidly addresses the problems with new policy shifts. [ICON_BULLET]Improvements naturally upgrade twice as fast. [ICON_BULLET]Workers are much faster than normal. [ICON_BULLET]Your people are more efficient at their jobs and thus you gain a Free Specialist in all cities to represent that added amount of labor. [ICON_BULLET]Military Units are significantly faster to train due to streamlined training regimens. [ICON_BULLET]The people are faster to forgive whipping to rush construction and training. [ICON_BULLET]Units are significantly cheaper to upgrade since they are faster to learn new ways to fight. Penalties: [ICON_BULLET]Trade Route profits are reduced for all yield types. [ICON_BULLET]This nation suffers more from War Weariness since war slows down development projects and enhances achievement stress. [ICON_BULLET]Units begin with one less Experience Point due to streamlined training procedures. [ICON_BULLET]Your nation naturally supports a reduced amount of Free Units based on a small percentage of the overall total population. [ICON_BULLET]Your cities are harder to defend since they are built for efficiency rather than holding invaders out. [ICON_BULLET]Golden Ages don't last as long because people get back to a sense of normal faster.

TEXT.English: Production bonuses and efficiency benefits but can lack for quality and can lead to long term unnecessary expenses due to accounting errors in the system. Runs out of patience even with positive things. Fast wonder builder.
TEXT.French: Des primes de production et des gains d'efficacité mais peuvent manquer de qualité et entraîner des dépenses inutiles à long terme en raison d'erreurs comptables dans le système. Manque de patience même avec des choses positives. Constructeur de merveilles rapide.

TEXT.English: Efficient CT
TEXT.Polish: Efektywny CT

TEXT.English: Efficient I
TEXT.Polish: Efektywny I

TEXT.English: Positive Trait "Make the most of what your nation provides you as a government. Cut corners in budget expenses so you have more to reinvest into high yield returns." This Leader runs the government like a very successful business that's not looking to profit so much as find out just how strong they can get the economy running overall. War is considered a little messy and undesirable for perfect function usually. Economic regulations are constantly perfected to a higher degree than most governments, making shifts in large scale policies more difficult to endure. Crime is a little higher here because there is the temptation of so much wealth to tap into and the economic competitiveness spurs more white-collar abuses. Primary Benefits: [ICON_BULLET]An additional Commerce is generated by any plot that generates as much as 7 or more. [ICON_BULLET]All cities gain an additional base Commerce. [ICON_BULLET]All cities gain a percentage modifier to Commerce. Side Benefits: [ICON_BULLET]All Trade Routes gain a percentage improvement to Commerce. [ICON_BULLET]Commerce focused Improvements generate an additional Commerce. [ICON_BULLET]Commerce focused Improvements upgrade much faster than normal. [ICON_BULLET]Commerce focused Improvements are much faster for your Workers to build. [ICON_BULLET]Lawyer, Citizen, and Slave type Specialists generate an additional Commerce. [ICON_BULLET]Gains an additional maximum Trade Route Cap in each city. [ICON_BULLET]Great Statesmen are more likely to be born. Penalties: [ICON_BULLET]War Weariness accumulates faster for your people, as war is a nuisance to Commerce. [ICON_BULLET]Anarchy time from switching Civics is much longer. [ICON_BULLET]Suffers more Crime.

TEXT.English: Efficient III
TEXT.Polish: Efektywny III

TEXT.English: Positive Trait "Make the most of what your nation provides you as a government. Cut corners in budget expenses so you have more to reinvest into high yield returns." This Leader runs the government like a very successful business that's not looking to profit so much as find out just how strong they can get the economy running overall. War is considered a little messy and undesirable for perfect function usually. Economic regulations are constantly perfected to a higher degree than most governments, making shifts in large scale policies more difficult to endure. Crime is a little higher here because there is the temptation of so much wealth to tap into and the economic competitiveness spurs more white-collar abuses. Primary Benefits: [ICON_BULLET]The threshold for a plot generating an additional Commerce drops from 6 to 5. [ICON_BULLET]All cities gain a significant amount of additional base Commerce. [ICON_BULLET]All cities gain a percentage modifier to Commerce. Side Benefits: [ICON_BULLET]All Trade Routes gain a percentage improvement to Commerce. [ICON_BULLET]Commerce focused Improvements generate an additional Commerce. [ICON_BULLET]Commerce focused Improvements upgrade much faster than normal. [ICON_BULLET]Commerce focused Improvements are much faster for your Workers to build. [ICON_BULLET]Lawyer, Citizen, and Slave type Specialists generate an additional Commerce. [ICON_BULLET]Corporation upkeep gets a large reduction. [ICON_BULLET]Great Statesmen are much more likely to be born. Penalties: [ICON_BULLET]War Weariness accumulates significantly faster for your people, as war is a nuisance to Commerce. [ICON_BULLET]Anarchy time from switching Civics is far longer. [ICON_BULLET]Suffers more Crime.

TEXT.English: Strong Commerce income. A little extra Anarchy time from the added struggle of having to reallocate investments to suit the new legal structure.
TEXT.French: Fort revenu du Commerce. Un peu de temps d'anarchie supplémentaire de la lutte supplémentaire d'avoir à réaffecter des investissements en fonction de la nouvelle structure juridique.

TEXT.English: Gloomy CT
TEXT.Polish: Ponury CT

TEXT.English: Gloomy I
TEXT.Polish: Ponury I

TEXT.English: Negative Trait "Faith will not help us. It's just us against the world so we must stay very serious about this struggle and never give in to fantasy or imagined glory." This dour downer tends to depress his nation but at least his people know he's taking things seriously. Pride is considered a dangerous thing to maintain here so morale can suffer in a number of ways and Religion is not as valued, and for many is deeply resented, as it cannot be empirically proven so appears tremendously foolish to a good portion of the populace, who have adopted the views of their Leader. Primary Penalties: [ICON_BULLET]Yield benefits from being in a Golden Age are significantly decreased. [ICON_BULLET]Commerce benefits from being in a Golden Age are significantly decreased. [ICON_BULLET]Golden Ages last far fewer rounds. [ICON_BULLET]Lose a percentage Experience point modifier boost in the Holy City of your State Religion. Side Penalties: [ICON_BULLET]World Wonders are constructed slower in your cities. [ICON_BULLET]National Wonders are constructed significantly slower in your cities. [ICON_BULLET]On the Revolution option, Holy Cities of your State Religion are less stable. [ICON_BULLET]Religious Buildings are slower to build. [ICON_BULLET]Cities where your State Religion is present are significantly slower at producing Great People, for it is often merely used to convince an even greater sense of the importance of toil. [ICON_BULLET]Wherever you've spread your State Religion, your people are assigned a base Unhappiness due to the conflict it creates in private lives. [ICON_BULLET]Units take longer to build where the State Religion has spread. [ICON_BULLET]Buildings take longer to construct where the State Religion has spread. [ICON_BULLET]Using slavery to rush builds results in greater lengths of city Unhappiness as people resent being asked to push even harder than they already must. Benefits: [ICON_BULLET]On the Revolution option, Holy Cities of Non-State Religions are more stable. [ICON_BULLET]The value of labor is high here so you get a Free Specialist in each city. [ICON_BULLET]Your people gain an Education bonus since nothing is glossed over for the sake of protecting innocence.

TEXT.Polish: Negatywna cecha: "Wiara nam nie pomo¿e. To tylko my przeciwko œwiatu, wiêc musimy podejœæ do tej walki bardzo powa¿nie i nigdy nie ulegaæ fantazjom ani wyimaginowanej chwale." Ten ponurak ma tendencjê do przygnêbiania swojego narodu, ale przynajmniej jego ludzie wiedz¹, ¿e traktuje wszystko powa¿nie. Dumê uwa¿a siê za niebezpieczn¹ rzecz, do posiadania w tym miejscu, wiêc morale mo¿e ucierpieæ na wiele sposobów, a religia nie jest tak ceniona, i dla wielu budzi ona g³êbok¹ niechêæ, poniewa¿ nie mo¿na jej udowodniæ empirycznie, przez co wydaje siê niezwykle g³upia du¿ej czêœci populacji, którzy przyjêli pogl¹dy swojego przywódcy. Podstawowe kary: [ICON_BULLET]Korzyœci dla plonów wynikaj¹ce z przebywania w Z³otym Wieku s¹ znacznie zmniejszone. [ICON_BULLET]Korzyœci dla Bogactwa wynikaj¹ce z przebywania w Z³otym Wieku s¹ znacznie zmniejszone. [ICON_BULLET]Z³ote Wieki trwaj¹ znacznie krócej. [ICON_BULLET]Tracisz procent premii do modyfikatora punktów doœwiadczenia w Œwiêtym Mieœcie swojej religii pañstwowej. Kary dodatkowe: [ICON_BULLET]Cuda Œwiata s¹ budowane wolniej w Twoich miastach. [ICON_BULLET]Cuda Narodowe s¹ budowane znacznie wolniej w Twoich miastach. [ICON_BULLET]W przypadku opcji Rewolucji Œwiête Miasto Twojej religii pañstwowej jest mniej stabilne. [ICON_BULLET]Budynki sakralne buduje siê wolniej. [ICON_BULLET]Miasta, w których obecna jest twoja religia pañstwowa, znacznie wolniej wytwarzaj¹ wielkich ludzi, poniewa¿ czêsto s³u¿y ona jedynie do wywo³ania jeszcze wiêkszego poczucia wagi pracy. [ICON_BULLET]Gdziekolwiek szerzysz swoj¹ religiê pañstwow¹, twoim ludziom przypisuje siê podstawowe nieszczêœcie z powodu konfliktu, jaki powoduje w ¿yciu prywatnym. [ICON_BULLET]Budowa jednostek tam, gdzie rozprzestrzeni³a siê religia pañstwowa trwa d³u¿ej. [ICON_BULLET]Budowa budynków trwa d³u¿ej tam, gdzie rozprzestrzeni³a siê religia pañstwowa. [ICON_BULLET]Poœpiech w budowaniu skutkuje wiêkszymi okresami niezadowolenia w miastach, poniewa¿ ludzie nie lubi¹, gdy proszeni s¹ o pracowanie jeszcze mocniej, ni¿ ju¿ musz¹. Korzyœci: [ICON_BULLET]W przypadku opcji Rewolucji Œwiête Miasta religii niepañstwowych s¹ bardziej stabilne. [ICON_BULLET]Praca jest wysoko ceniona, wiêc w ka¿dym mieœcie znajdziesz darmowego specjalistê. [ICON_BULLET]Twoi ludzie zyskuj¹ premiê do edukacji, poniewa¿ nic nie jest pomijane w imiê ochrony niewinnoœci.

[ICON_BULLET]Miasta, w których obecna jest twoja religia pañstwowa, znacznie wolniej wytwarzaj¹ wielkich ludzi, poniewa¿ czêsto s³u¿y ona jedynie do wywo³ania jeszcze wiêkszego poczucia wagi pracy. [ICON_BULLET]Gdziekolwiek szerzysz swoj¹ religiê pañstwow¹, twoim ludziom przypisuje siê podstawowe nieszczêœcie z powodu konfliktu, jaki powoduje w ¿yciu prywatnym. [ICON_BULLET]Budowa jednostek tam, gdzie rozprzestrzeni³a siê religia pañstwowa trwa d³u¿ej. [ICON_BULLET]Budowa budynków trwa d³u¿ej tam, gdzie rozprzestrzeni³a siê religia pañstwowa. [ICON_BULLET]Poœpiech w budowaniu skutkuje wiêkszymi okresami niezadowolenia w miastach, poniewa¿ ludzie nie lubi¹, gdy proszeni s¹ o pracowanie jeszcze mocniej, ni¿ ju¿ musz¹. Korzyœci: [ICON_BULLET]W przypadku opcji Rewolucji Œwiête Miasta religii niepañstwowych s¹ bardziej stabilne. [ICON_BULLET]Praca jest wysoko ceniona, wiêc w ka¿dym mieœcie znajdziesz darmowego specjalistê. TEXT.English: Gloomy III
TEXT.Polish: Ponury III

TEXT.English: Negative Trait "Faith will not help us. It's just us against the world so we must stay very serious about this struggle and never give in to fantasy or imagined glory." This dour downer tends to depress his nation but at least his people know he's taking things seriously. Pride is considered a dangerous thing to maintain here so morale can suffer in a number of ways and Religion is not as valued, and for many is deeply resented, as it cannot be empirically proven so appears tremendously foolish to a good portion of the populace, who have adopted the views of their Leader. Primary Penalties: [ICON_BULLET]Yield benefits from being in a Golden Age are strongly decreased. [ICON_BULLET]Commerce benefits from being in a Golden Age are strongly decreased. [ICON_BULLET]Golden Ages last far fewer rounds. [ICON_BULLET]Lose a significant percentage Experience point modifier boost in the Holy City of your State Religion. Side Penalties: [ICON_BULLET]World Wonders are constructed significantly slower in your cities. [ICON_BULLET]National Wonders are constructed significantly slower in your cities. [ICON_BULLET]On the Revolution option, Holy Cities of your State Religion are less stable. [ICON_BULLET]Religious Buildings are slower to build. [ICON_BULLET]Cities where your State Religion is present are much slower at producing Great People, for it is often merely used to convince an even greater sense of the importance of toil. [ICON_BULLET]Units take longer to build where the State Religion has spread. [ICON_BULLET]Buildings take longer to construct where the State Religion has spread. Benefits: [ICON_BULLET]On the Revolution option, Holy Cities of Non-State Religions are more stable. [ICON_BULLET]Workers are significantly faster. They accept lives of toil easier. [ICON_BULLET]You enjoy a significant decrease in the Maintenance from Number of Cities since you do not allocate funds for revelry. [ICON_BULLET]The value of labor is high here so you get a Free Specialist in each city. [ICON_BULLET]Your people gain an Education bonus since nothing is glossed over for the sake of protecting innocence.

TEXT.English: Negative Trait "Faith will not help us. It's just us against the world so we must stay very serious about this struggle and never give in to fantasy or imagined glory." This dour downer tends to depress his nation but at least his people know he's taking things seriously. Pride is considered a dangerous thing to maintain here so morale can suffer in a number of ways and Religion is not as valued, and for many is deeply resented, as it cannot be empirically proven so appears tremendously foolish to a good portion of the populace, who have adopted the views of their Leader. Primary Penalties: [ICON_BULLET]Yield benefits from being in a Golden Age are strongly decreased. [ICON_BULLET]Commerce benefits from being in a Golden Age are strongly decreased. [ICON_BULLET]Golden Ages last far fewer rounds. [ICON_BULLET]Lose a percentage Experience point modifier boost in the Holy City of your State Religion. Side Penalties: [ICON_BULLET]World Wonders are constructed significantly slower in your cities. [ICON_BULLET]National Wonders are constructed significantly slower in your cities. [ICON_BULLET]On the Revolution option, Holy Cities of your State Religion are less stable. [ICON_BULLET]Religious Buildings are slower to build. [ICON_BULLET]Cities where your State Religion is present are significantly slower at producing Great People, for it is often merely used to convince an even greater sense of the importance of toil. [ICON_BULLET]Wherever you've spread your State Religion, your people are assigned a base Unhappiness due to the conflict it creates in private lives. [ICON_BULLET]Units take longer to build where the State Religion has spread. [ICON_BULLET]Buildings take longer to construct where the State Religion has spread. [ICON_BULLET]Using slavery to rush builds results in greater lengths of city Unhappiness as people resent being asked to push even harder than they already must. Benefits: [ICON_BULLET]On the Revolution option, Holy Cities of Non-State Religions are more stable. [ICON_BULLET]Workers are significantly faster. They accept lives of toil easier. [ICON_BULLET]You enjoy a significant decrease in the Maintenance from Number of Cities since you do not allocate funds for revelry. [ICON_BULLET]The value of labor is high here so you get a Free Specialist in each city. [ICON_BULLET]Your people gain an Education bonus since nothing is glossed over for the sake of protecting innocence.

TEXT.English: Golden Ages are much less valuable for this Leader and his people, and there are some secondary impediments to Religion.
TEXT.French: Les âges d'or sont beaucoup moins précieux pour ce chef et son peuple, et il existe des obstacles secondaires à la Religion.

TEXT.English: Glorious CT
TEXT.Polish: Wspania³y CT

TEXT.English: Glorious I
TEXT.Polish: Wspania³y I

TEXT.English: Positive Trait "Our Leader stands at the side of the Divine. Divine forces are aligned with us, as we are the chosen people." Your Leader may or may not believe in what he claims but he surely understands the power of pumping the morale of the people with the idea of exceptionalism. Your people have been well convinced that they are special and blessed and while that might be insufferable to some, you can't deny that there is almost always a Great sense of pride for being a citizen here. Primary Benefits: [ICON_BULLET]Yield benefits from being in a Golden Age are increased significantly. [ICON_BULLET]Commerce benefits from being in a Golden Age are increased significantly. [ICON_BULLET]Golden Ages last half again as long as normal. [ICON_BULLET]Gain a percentage Experience point modifier boost in the Holy City of your State Religion. [ICON_BULLET]All cities you found or capture are immediately given your State Religion. Side Benefits: [ICON_BULLET]World Wonders are constructed faster in your cities. [ICON_BULLET]National Wonders are constructed faster in your cities. [ICON_BULLET]On the Revolution option, Holy Cities of your State Religion are more stable. [ICON_BULLET]Religious Buildings are faster to build. [ICON_BULLET]Cities where your State Religion is present are significantly faster at producing Great People. [ICON_BULLET]Reduction in the length of Unhappiness from using slavery to rush builds. People are more willing to put in the sacrifice. Penalties: [ICON_BULLET]On the Revolution option, Holy Cities of Non-State Religions are less stable. [ICON_BULLET]The narcissism you've spread among your people has a labor demotivating effect, so you lose a Free Specialist. [ICON_BULLET]Your people suffer an Education penalty, since your Leader often misleads them into false claims to support the premise of their superiority.

Side Benefits: [ICON_BULLET]World Wonders are constructed faster in your cities. [ICON_BULLET]National Wonders are constructed faster in your cities. [ICON_BULLET]On the Revolution option, Holy Cities of your State Religion are more stable. [ICON_BULLET]Religious Buildings are faster to build. [ICON_BULLET]Cities where your State Religion is present are significantly faster at producing Great People. [ICON_BULLET]Wherever you've spread your State Religion, your people are Happier. Penalties: [ICON_BULLET]On the Revolution option, Holy Cities of Non-State Religions are less stable. [ICON_BULLET]Religious Anarchy periods much longer since the people are so proud of being central to the Religion they believe. [ICON_BULLET]You suffer an increase in the Maintenance from Number of Cities since spending on regular revelry creates significant expenses for each urban center. [ICON_BULLET]Your people suffer an Education penalty, since your Leader often misleads them into false claims to support the premise of their superiority.

TEXT.English: Glorious III
TEXT.Polish: Chwalebny III

TEXT.English: Positive Trait "Our Leader stands at the side of the Divine. Divine forces are aligned with us, as we are the chosen people." Your Leader may or may not believe in what he claims but he surely understands the power of pumping the morale of the people with the idea of exceptionalism. Your people have been well convinced that they are special and blessed and while that might be insufferable to some, you can't deny that there is almost always a Great sense of pride for being a citizen here. Primary Benefits: [ICON_BULLET]Yield benefits from being in a Golden Age are increased significantly. [ICON_BULLET]Commerce benefits from being in a Golden Age are increased significantly. [ICON_BULLET]Golden Ages last half again as long as normal. [ICON_BULLET]Gain a significant percentage Experience point modifier boost in the Holy City of your State Religion. Side Benefits: [ICON_BULLET]World Wonders are constructed significantly faster in your cities. [ICON_BULLET]National Wonders are constructed significantly faster in your cities. [ICON_BULLET]On the Revolution option, Holy Cities of your State Religion are more stable. [ICON_BULLET]Religious Buildings are faster to build. [ICON_BULLET]Cities where your State Religion is present are much faster at producing Great People. [ICON_BULLET]Wherever you've spread your State Religion, your people are Happier. Penalties: [ICON_BULLET]On the Revolution option, Holy Cities of Non-State Religions are less stable. [ICON_BULLET]Religious Anarchy periods twice as long since the people are so proud of being central to the Religion they believe. [ICON_BULLET]You suffer an significant increase in the Maintenance from Number of Cities since spending on regular revelry creates significant expenses for each urban center. [ICON_BULLET]The narcissism you've spread among your people has a labor demotivating effect, so you lose a Free Specialist. [ICON_BULLET]Your people suffer an Education penalty, since your Leader often misleads them into false claims to support the premise of their superiority.

Your Leader may or may not believe in what he claims but he surely understands the power of pumping the morale of the people with the idea of exceptionalism. Your people have been well convinced that they are special and blessed and while that might be insufferable to some, you can't deny that there is almost always a Great sense of pride for being a citizen here. Primary Benefits: [ICON_BULLET]Yield benefits from being in a Golden Age are increased by half. [ICON_BULLET]Commerce benefits from being in a Golden Age are increased by half. TEXT.English: Gluttonous CT
TEXT.Polish: ¯ar³oczny CT

TEXT.English: Gluttonous I
TEXT.Polish: ¯ar³oczny I

TEXT.English: Negative Trait "Eat what we have while we have it for famine may strike any day." Though you and your people may be unhealthy from being overweight and underworked, they tend to be blissful, particularly in urban lifestyles where they can be truly excessive with the nation's bounty. Primary Penalty: [ICON_BULLET]One less Food is generated by any plot that generates as much as 7 or more. [ICON_BULLET]All cities lose one base Food. [ICON_BULLET]All cities lose a percentage penalty to Food. Unique Abilities: [ICON_BULLET]Food is converted to Production in any unit engaged in training a unit. Side Penalties: [ICON_BULLET]Your cities are all less Healthy thanks to eating in excess. [ICON_BULLET]Food focused Improvements generate less Food. [ICON_BULLET]Food focused Improvements upgrade much slower as normal. [ICON_BULLET]Food focused Improvements are much slower for your to build. [ICON_BULLET]Noble, Citizen, and Slave type Specialists are penalized a Food. [ICON_BULLET]Technologies that enhance Food production and storage are discovered slower. [ICON_BULLET]Maintenance for Number of Cities is increased since communities often eat more than they are budgeted for. [ICON_BULLET]Military units take longer to train since they are often more overweight when they enlist and require more training to get in shape. Benefits: [ICON_BULLET]Your cities are all Happier. [ICON_BULLET]Great People are faster to be born because your people feel more comfortable being themselves. [ICON_BULLET]Satiated citizens are less argumentative, so Civic changes don't cause as much Anarchy time.

TEXT.English: Gluttonous III

TEXT.English: Negative Trait "Eat what we have while we have it for famine may strike any day." Though you and your people may be unhealthy from being overweight and underworked, they tend to be blissful, particularly in urban lifestyles where they can be truly excessive with the nation's bounty. Primary Penalty: [ICON_BULLET]The threshold for a plot generating one less Food drops from 6 to 5. [ICON_BULLET]All cities lose a significant amount of base Food. [ICON_BULLET]All cities lose a percentage penalty to Food. Side Penalties: [ICON_BULLET]Your cities are all significantly less Healthy thanks to eating in excess. [ICON_BULLET]Food focused Improvements generate less Food. [ICON_BULLET]Food focused Improvements upgrade much slower as normal. [ICON_BULLET]Food focused Improvements are much slower for your to build. [ICON_BULLET]Noble, Citizen, and Slave type Specialists are penalized a Food. [ICON_BULLET]Technologies that enhance Food production and storage are discovered slower. [ICON_BULLET]Maintenance for Number of Cities is increased since communities often eat more than they are budgeted for. Benefits: [ICON_BULLET]Your cities are all Happier. [ICON_BULLET]Great People are faster to be born because your people feel more comfortable being themselves. [ICON_BULLET]Satiated citizens are less argumentative, so Civic changes don't cause as much Anarchy time. [ICON_BULLET]Corporation upkeep is diminished due to higher profits from Food product sales. [ICON_BULLET]Your largest cities are significantly Happier since your people prefer urban living. [ICON_BULLET]Golden Ages last longer than usual because your people greatly enjoy times of prosperity.

TEXT.English: Negative Trait "Eat what we have while we have it for famine may strike any day." Though you and your people may be unhealthy from being overweight and underworked, they tend to be blissful, particularly in urban lifestyles where they can be truly excessive with the nation's bounty. Primary Penalty: [ICON_BULLET]One less Food is generated by any plot that generates as much as 7 or more. [ICON_BULLET]All cities lose one base Food. [ICON_BULLET]All cities lose a significant percentage penalty to Food. Unique Abilities: [ICON_BULLET]Food is converted to Production in any unit engaged in training a unit. Side Penalties: [ICON_BULLET]Your cities are all less Healthy thanks to eating in excess. [ICON_BULLET]Food focused Improvements generate less Food. [ICON_BULLET]Food focused Improvements upgrade much slower as normal. [ICON_BULLET]Food focused Improvements are much slower for your to build. [ICON_BULLET]Noble, Citizen, and Slave type Specialists are penalized a Food. [ICON_BULLET]Technologies that enhance Food production and storage are discovered slower. [ICON_BULLET]Maintenance for Number of Cities is significantly increased since communities often eat more than they are budgeted for. [ICON_BULLET]Military units take significantly longer to train since they are often more overweight when they enlist and require more training to get in shape. Benefits: [ICON_BULLET]Your cities are all Happier. [ICON_BULLET]Great People are significantly faster to be born because your people feel more comfortable being themselves. [ICON_BULLET]Satiated citizens are less argumentative, so Civic changes don't cause as much Anarchy time. [ICON_BULLET]Corporation upkeep is diminished due to higher profits from Food product sales. [ICON_BULLET]Your largest cities are Happier since your people prefer urban living. [ICON_BULLET]Golden Ages last longer than usual because your people greatly enjoy times of prosperity.

TEXT.English: Poor Food, mostly due to extra consumption. Happier people thinking things are always plentiful when in reality they often deplete their Food stores.
TEXT.French: Mauvaise nourriture, principalement en raison d'une consommation supplémentaire. Les gens plus heureux qui pensent que les choses sont toujours abondantes alors qu'en réalité, ils épuisent souvent leurs magasins d'alimentation.

TEXT.English: Greedy CT
TEXT.Polish: Chciwy CT

TEXT.English: Greedy I
TEXT.Polish: Chciwy I

TEXT.English: Negative Trait "The wealth of the nation is my own to hoard and spend on my own desires." A lot of the treasury goes missing here thanks to you and others dipping into profits for personal goals. People are Unhappy with all the selfish financial corruption at the top. Some spending selfish to the Leader is beneficial and he's quick to exploit people so in some cases that can benefit the national interest. Primary Penalties: [ICON_BULLET]All cities produce a couple less base Gold. [ICON_BULLET]All cities suffer a percentage penalty to Gold. [ICON_BULLET]All Specialists cost a Gold. Side Penalties: [ICON_BULLET]Your cities are all less Happy, knowing of your excesses with their taxed earnings. [ICON_BULLET]The overall upkeep expense is higher due to skimming. [ICON_BULLET]Fewer Great People are born here because financial opportunity is more scarce. [ICON_BULLET]Buildings that are focused on wealth generation are slower to build. [ICON_BULLET]Merchant type Specialists are penalized a Commerce. [ICON_BULLET]Citizen and Slave type Specialists cost a Gold penalty. [ICON_BULLET]Your Capital generates a small percentage less Gold. [ICON_BULLET]Technologies that lead to wealth Improvements are slower to discover. [ICON_BULLET]Corporate Maintenance is increased. Corporations suffer from higher taxation and thus do not run as efficiently. [ICON_BULLET]Great Merchants are less likely to be born. [ICON_BULLET]Public financial desperation increases the Crime rate. Benefits: [ICON_BULLET]World Wonders are constructed faster due to increased spending on anything the Leader wants. [ICON_BULLET]National Wonders are constructed faster since local governing bodies are Happy to overspend to match the Leader's budgets for impressive works. [ICON_BULLET]Civic Anarchy time is slightly reduced since palms are quickly greased to adapt to the Leader's whims. [ICON_BULLET]Improvements upgrade faster naturally since the Leader is Happy to spend to excess to make this happen. [ICON_BULLET]Workers complete Improvements on plots faster since the crews are overfunded. [ICON_BULLET]An extra citizens can be drafted with a conscription action because more people are desperate to find ways to support their families. [ICON_BULLET]Underpaying the salaries for your military gives you some extra free units. [ICON_BULLET]The cost of rushing buildings and units is reduced significantly as people are willing to work for less where money is scarce.

[ICON_BULLET]W ramach akcji poboru do wojska mo¿na powo³aæ dodatkowego obywatela, poniewa¿ coraz wiêcej osób desperacko szuka sposobów na utrzymanie swoich rodzin. [ICON_BULLET]Niedop³acanie wynagrodzeñ dla wojska zapewnia dodatkowe wolne jednostki. [ICON_BULLET]Koszty szybkiego budowania budynków i jednostek s¹ znacznie obni¿one, poniewa¿ ludzie s¹ sk³onni pracowaæ za mniej tam, gdzie brakuje pieniêdzy.

TEXT.English: Greedy II
TEXT.Polish: Chciwy II

TEXT.English: Negative Trait "The wealth of the nation is my own to hoard and spend on my own desires." A lot of the treasury goes missing here thanks to you and others dipping into profits for personal goals. People are Unhappy with all the selfish financial corruption at the top. Some spending selfish to the Leader is beneficial and he's quick to exploit people so in some cases that can benefit the national interest. Primary Penalties: [ICON_BULLET]All cities produce less base Gold. [ICON_BULLET]All cities suffer a percentage penalty to Gold. [ICON_BULLET]All Specialists cost a Gold. Side Penalties: [ICON_BULLET]Your cities are all less Happy, knowing of your excesses with their taxed earnings. [ICON_BULLET]The overall upkeep expense is higher due to skimming. [ICON_BULLET]Fewer Great People are born here because financial opportunity is more scarce. [ICON_BULLET]Buildings that are focused on wealth generation are slower to build. [ICON_BULLET]Noble type Specialists are penalized a Commerce. [ICON_BULLET]Merchant type Specialists cost a few Gold penalty. [ICON_BULLET]Your Capital generates a small percentage less Gold. [ICON_BULLET]Technologies that lead to wealth Improvements are slower to discover. [ICON_BULLET]Corporate Maintenance is increased. Corporations suffer from higher taxation and thus do not run as efficiently. [ICON_BULLET]Great Merchants are less likely to be born. [ICON_BULLET]Public financial desperation increases the Crime rate. Benefits: [ICON_BULLET]World Wonders are constructed faster due to increased spending on anything the Leader wants. [ICON_BULLET]National Wonders are constructed faster since local governing bodies are Happy to overspend to match the Leader's budgets for impressive works. [ICON_BULLET]Civic Anarchy time is slightly reduced since palms are quickly greased to adapt to the Leader's whims. [ICON_BULLET]Improvements upgrade faster naturally since the Leader is Happy to spend to excess to make this happen. [ICON_BULLET]Workers complete Improvements on plots faster since the crews are overfunded. [ICON_BULLET]A couple extra citizens can be drafted with a conscription action because more people are desperate to find ways to support their families. [ICON_BULLET]Underpaying the salaries for your military gives you some extra free units. [ICON_BULLET]The cost of rushing buildings and units is reduced significantly as people are willing to work for less where money is scarce.

TEXT.English: Weak Gold generation and increased upkeep. Some construction projects are completed faster.
TEXT.French: Faible génération d'or et entretien accru. Certains projets de construction sont achevés plus rapidement.

TEXT.English: Grim CT
TEXT.Polish: Mroczny CT

TEXT.English: Grim I
TEXT.Polish: Mroczny I

TEXT.English: Negative Trait "This is a harsh world. Raising children in this environment is a major risk to the community even if it is necessary to our future. Aside from it being quite possible to end up with too many mouths to feed, we can also quickly end up with too many voices to contend with. I urge restraint so that we may provide for those in our care while retaining as much focus on more important matters as we can. It is THIS generation that is my concern, much moreso than the next." This Leader is worried that if his people overgrow their infrastructure to support them that he will be faced with starvation and be saddled with added expenses to the nation's coffers. He therefore promotes smaller families that wait to grow until they are financially secure and well prepared to support their kids. It may not be unwise, but it does impede population expansion and ultimately the strength of the nation. Primary Penalties: [ICON_BULLET]All cities suffer a percentage penalty to Food and Commerce. [ICON_BULLET]Cities require a little more Food to grow. Side Penalties: [ICON_BULLET]All cities are less Happy with this dour outlook. [ICON_BULLET]Great People are born slower here due to the expressed lack of confidence in people to provide and excel. [ICON_BULLET]Your cities all produce one less base Food and Commerce. [ICON_BULLET]War Weariness accumulates faster since your people invest more into their young and feel they have less people to sacrifice to a war. [ICON_BULLET]You get fewer citizens drafted with each conscription action in a city. [ICON_BULLET]Maintenance from Distance to City is enhanced due to greater investments into more vulnerable regions. [ICON_BULLET]Maintenance from Number of Cities is increased since your Leader tends to overspend to insure additional communities against fears for their well-being. [ICON_BULLET]Military units are trained somewhat slower since there is a reluctance among families to allow their children to enlist. [ICON_BULLET]Golden Ages don't last as long thanks to the more serious outlook people take here tending to dampen spirits. [ICON_BULLET]Anger for rushing construction and training lasts longer here since life is held at a high value. [ICON_BULLET]Units you defeat are somewhat less likely to be captured because of concerns of bringing potential enemies home. [ICON_BULLET]Your units are more likely to be captured when defeated because they have been taught to value self preservation. Benefits: [ICON_BULLET]Great Generals emerge a little faster since it is of the utmost importance that militaries from smaller populations are led more effectively. [ICON_BULLET]Your cities generate an extra base Gold. [ICON_BULLET]Your cities all gain a percentage modifier to Gold. [ICON_BULLET]Citizen and Slave type Specialists work harder to produce for their employers since there are fewer of them to go around, so earn an extra Gold each. [ICON_BULLET]Your cities have slightly improved defenses thanks to your added investments into their safety.

TEXT.English: Grim II
TEXT.Polish: Mroczny II

TEXT.English: Negative Trait "This is a harsh world. Raising children in this environment is a major risk to the community even if it is necessary to our future. Aside from it being quite possible to end up with too many mouths to feed, we can also quickly end up with too many voices to contend with. I urge restraint so that we may provide for those in our care while retaining as much focus on more important matters as we can. It is THIS generation that is my concern, much moreso than the next." This Leader is worried that if his people overgrow their infrastructure to support them that he will be faced with starvation and be saddled with added expenses to the nation's coffers. He therefore promotes smaller families that wait to grow until they are financially secure and well prepared to support their kids. It may not be unwise, but it does impede population expansion and ultimately the strength of the nation. Primary Penalties: [ICON_BULLET]All cities suffer a percentage penalty to Food and Commerce. [ICON_BULLET]Cities require more Food to grow. Side Penalties: [ICON_BULLET]All cities are less Happy with this dour outlook. [ICON_BULLET]Great People are born slower here due to the expressed lack of confidence in people to provide and excel. [ICON_BULLET]Your cities all produce one less base Food and Commerce. [ICON_BULLET]War Weariness accumulates faster since your people invest more into their young and feel they have less people to sacrifice to a war. [ICON_BULLET]You get fewer citizens drafted with each conscription action in a city. [ICON_BULLET]Maintenance from Distance to City is enhanced due to greater investments into more vulnerable regions. [ICON_BULLET]Maintenance from Number of Cities is increased since your Leader tends to overspend to insure additional communities against fears for their well-being. [ICON_BULLET]Your largest cities are less Happy because you show more worry for your most populous centers. [ICON_BULLET]Military units are trained slower since there is a reluctance among families to allow their children to enlist. [ICON_BULLET]Golden Ages don't last as long thanks to the more serious outlook people take here tending to dampen spirits. [ICON_BULLET]Anger for rushing construction and training lasts longer here since life is held at a high value. [ICON_BULLET]Units you defeat are somewhat less likely to be captured because of concerns of bringing potential enemies home. [ICON_BULLET]Your units are significantly more likely to be captured when defeated because they have been taught to value self preservation. Benefits: [ICON_BULLET]Great Generals emerge faster since it is of the utmost importance that militaries from smaller populations are led more effectively. [ICON_BULLET]Your cities generate an extra base Gold. [ICON_BULLET]Your cities all gain a percentage modifier to Gold. [ICON_BULLET]Engineer and Merchant type Specialists take greater care with their investments so earn an extra Gold each. [ICON_BULLET]Your cities have improved defenses thanks to your added investments into their safety.

TEXT.English: Negative Trait "This is a harsh world. Raising children in this environment is a major risk to the community even if it is necessary to our future. Aside from it being quite possible to end up with too many mouths to feed, we can also quickly end up with too many voices to contend with. I urge restraint so that we may provide for those in our care while retaining as much focus on more important matters as we can. It is THIS generation that is my concern, much moreso than the next." This Leader is worried that if his people overgrow their infrastructure to support them that he will be faced with starvation and be saddled with added expenses to the nation's coffers. He therefore promotes smaller families that wait to grow until they are financially secure and well prepared to support their kids. It may not be unwise, but it does impede population expansion and ultimately the strength of the nation. Primary Penalties: [ICON_BULLET]All cities suffer a percentage penalty to Food and Commerce. [ICON_BULLET]Cities require much more Food to grow. Side Penalties: [ICON_BULLET]All cities are less Happy with this dour outlook. [ICON_BULLET]Great People are born much slower here due to the expressed lack of confidence in people to provide and excel. [ICON_BULLET]Your cities all produce one less base Food and Commerce. [ICON_BULLET]War Weariness accumulates faster since your people invest more into their young and feel they have less people to sacrifice to a war. [ICON_BULLET]You get fewer citizens drafted with each conscription action in a city. [ICON_BULLET]Maintenance from Distance to City is enhanced due to greater investments into more vulnerable regions. [ICON_BULLET]Maintenance from Number of Cities is increased since your Leader tends to overspend to insure additional communities against fears for their well-being. [ICON_BULLET]Your largest cities are less Happy because you show more worry for your most populous centers. [ICON_BULLET]Military units are trained slower since there is a reluctance among families to allow their children to enlist. [ICON_BULLET]Golden Ages don't last as long thanks to the more serious outlook people take here tending to dampen spirits. [ICON_BULLET]Anger for rushing construction and training lasts longer here since life is held at a high value. [ICON_BULLET]Units you defeat are less likely to be captured because of concerns of bringing potential enemies home. [ICON_BULLET]Your units are significantly more likely to be captured when defeated because they have been taught to value self preservation. Benefits: [ICON_BULLET]Great Generals emerge faster since it is of the utmost importance that militaries from smaller populations are led more effectively. [ICON_BULLET]Your cities generate an extra few base Gold. [ICON_BULLET]Your cities all gain a percentage modifier to Gold. [ICON_BULLET]Engineer and Noble type Specialists watch their investments carefully and earn an extra Gold each. [ICON_BULLET]Your cities have improved defenses thanks to your added investments into their safety.

TEXT.English: Honest CT
TEXT.Polish: Szczery CT

TEXT.English: Honest I
TEXT.Polish: Szczery I

TEXT.English: Positive Trait "One is judged by the integrity of their word. The state needs to be upfront and share our knowledge with the people." Some may question whether an honest, forthright, straightforward Leader is a wise one. But this Leader knows how to use his honesty in a manner that serves him, proverbially Throwing himself on his sword when necessary to prove the point that he will always be open with people, even when it would be more convenient not to be. He's not all that Great with Espionage, rather his people aren't thanks to not being quite as clever as their Leader when adopting him as a role-model. He is well loved by all and his policy of truth pays off with many dividends in Trade and diplomacy, most powerfully to strongly motivate his people when he can clearly show that the nation is on the right track. He is no fool and is not hobbled strategically by his nature. He may be honest, but he also knows how to time the release of information in the most effective manner possible. More often, his tactic to achieve this strategy is to avoid having things to hide in the first place. Primary Benefits: [ICON_BULLET]Your people are significantly easier to Educate. [ICON_BULLET]Golden Ages are significantly more profitable for all Yields. [ICON_BULLET]Golden Ages are significantly more profitable for all Commerces. Side Benefits: [ICON_BULLET]Your cities are all Happier, able to believe their Leader. [ICON_BULLET]Civic Anarchy periods are reduced. [ICON_BULLET]All of your cities gain an additional Trade Route. Merchants love the straightforward deals they get here. [ICON_BULLET]You gain a Diplomatic bonus since other Leaders feel they can take you at your word. [ICON_BULLET]Foreign Trade Routes are more profitable since your people's fair dealings lead to improved results with foreign businessmen who are normally reluctant to trust. Penalties: [ICON_BULLET]Your cities are significantly easier to perform Espionage Missions in. [ICON_BULLET]The length of Golden Ages is significantly reduced since your society takes so much advantage of the time they have in their exuberance. [ICON_BULLET]Your people take significantly longer to forgive being whipped to rush construction and training projects. [ICON_BULLET]All Non-State Religions are significantly harder to spread.

TEXT.English: Honest II
TEXT.Polish: Szczery II

TEXT.English: Positive Trait "One is judged by the integrity of their word. The state needs to be upfront and share our knowledge with the people." Some may question whether an honest, forthright, straightforward Leader is a wise one. But this Leader knows how to use his honesty in a manner that serves him, proverbially Throwing himself on his sword when necessary to prove the point that he will always be open with people, even when it would be more convenient not to be. He's not all that Great with Espionage, rather his people aren't thanks to not being quite as clever as their Leader when adopting him as a role-model. He is well loved by all and his policy of truth pays off with many dividends in Trade and diplomacy, most powerfully to strongly motivate his people when he can clearly show that the nation is on the right track. He is no fool and is not hobbled strategically by his nature. He may be honest, but he also knows how to time the release of information in the most effective manner possible. More often, his tactic to achieve this strategy is to avoid having things to hide in the first place. Primary Benefits: [ICON_BULLET]Your people are significantly easier to Educate. [ICON_BULLET]Golden Ages are significantly more profitable for all Yields. [ICON_BULLET]Golden Ages are significantly more profitable for all Commerces. Side Benefits: [ICON_BULLET]Your cities are all Happier, able to believe their Leader. [ICON_BULLET]Civic Anarchy periods are reduced. [ICON_BULLET]You gain a Free Specialist in all cities. Your people are more effective in this honest and cooperative society. [ICON_BULLET]You gain a Diplomatic bonus since other Leaders feel they can take you at your word. [ICON_BULLET]Foreign Trade Routes are significantly more profitable since your people's fair dealings lead to improved results with foreign businessmen who are normally reluctant to trust. Penalties: [ICON_BULLET]All Specialists cost an Espionage. [ICON_BULLET]Your cities are easier to perform Espionage Missions in. [ICON_BULLET]The length of Golden Ages is significantly reduced since your society takes so much advantage of the time they have in their exuberance. [ICON_BULLET]Your State Religion is significantly harder to spread.

TEXT.English: Honest III
TEXT.Polish: Szczery III

TEXT.English: Positive Trait "One is judged by the integrity of their word. The state needs to be upfront and share our knowledge with the people." Some may question whether an honest, forthright, straightforward Leader is a wise one. But this Leader knows how to use his honesty in a manner that serves him, proverbially Throwing himself on his sword when necessary to prove the point that he will always be open with people, even when it would be more convenient not to be. He's not all that Great with Espionage, rather his people aren't thanks to not being quite as clever as their Leader when adopting him as a role-model. He is well loved by all and his policy of truth pays off with many dividends in Trade and diplomacy, most powerfully to strongly motivate his people when he can clearly show that the nation is on the right track. He is no fool and is not hobbled strategically by his nature. He may be honest, but he also knows how to time the release of information in the most effective manner possible. More often, his tactic to achieve this strategy is to avoid having things to hide in the first place. Primary Benefits: [ICON_BULLET]Your people are significantly easier to Educate. [ICON_BULLET]Golden Ages are significantly more profitable for all Yields. [ICON_BULLET]Golden Ages are significantly more profitable for all Commerces. Side Benefits: [ICON_BULLET]Your cities are all Happier, able to believe their Leader. [ICON_BULLET]Civic Anarchy periods are significantly reduced. [ICON_BULLET]You gain a Free Specialist in all cities. Your people are more effective in this honest and cooperative society. [ICON_BULLET]All of your cities gain an additional Trade Route. Merchants love the straightforward deals they get here. [ICON_BULLET]You gain a Diplomatic bonus since other Leaders feel they can take you at your word. [ICON_BULLET]Foreign Trade Routes are significantly more profitable since your people's fair dealings lead to improved results with foreign businessmen who are normally reluctant to trust. Penalties: [ICON_BULLET]All Specialists cost an Espionage. [ICON_BULLET]Your cities are significantly easier to perform Espionage Missions in. [ICON_BULLET]The length of Golden Ages is significantly reduced since your society takes so much advantage of the time they have in their exuberance. [ICON_BULLET]All Religions are harder to spread, a touch moreso if it is not your State Religion.

But this Leader knows how to use his honesty in a manner that serves him, proverbially Throwing himself on his sword when necessary to prove the point that he will always be open with people, even when it would be more convenient not to be. He's not all that Great with Espionage, rather his people aren't thanks to not being quite as clever as their Leader when adopting him as a role-model. He is well loved by all and his policy of truth pays off with many dividends in Trade and diplomacy, most powerfully to strongly motivate his people when he can clearly show that the nation is on the right track. He is no fool and is not hobbled strategically by his nature. He may be honest, but he also knows how to time the release of information in the most effective manner possible. More often, his tactic to achieve this strategy is to avoid having things to hide in the first place. Primary Benefits: [ICON_BULLET]Your people are significantly easier to Educate. TEXT.English: Education benefits. Political and Trade benefits. Nation is much more powerful during Golden Ages, though those are a bit shorter. Popular. Can suffer with some Espionage penalties.
TEXT.French: Avantages d'éducation. Avantages politiques et commerciaux. Nation est beaucoup plus puissant pendant l'âge d'or, bien que ceux-ci soient un peu plus courts. Populaire. Peut souffrir avec quelques pénalités d'espionnage.

TEXT.English: Humble CT
TEXT.Polish: Skromny CT

TEXT.English: Humble I
TEXT.Polish: Skromny I

TEXT.English: Positive Trait "All ideas should be heard and respected. I judge all things down the middle of any disagreement to make the best determinations." This Leader enjoys a nation that is very productive in Gold, Espionage, Food and production. His people don't seek glory, which is as helpful with diplomacy. In fact, this is one of the most beneficial traits for working with other Leaders. However, on the downside, impressive works and the personal achievements that make individuals Great are not all that important to this society and are therefore harder to generate. Primary Benefits: [ICON_BULLET]All cities gain a percentage modifier to Gold and Espionage. [ICON_BULLET]All cities gain a percentage modifier to Food and Production. Side Benefits: [ICON_BULLET]Overall upkeep is reduced a little since there is improved cooperative efforts among governmental factions with competing needs. [ICON_BULLET]National Wonders and Team Projects are faster to build due to the degree of cohesive cooperation and willingness to enhance local support functions that your citizens display. [ICON_BULLET]All cities get an additional base Gold and Espionage. [ICON_BULLET]All cities get an additional base Food and Production. [ICON_BULLET]Gains a bonus to Diplomacy. [ICON_BULLET]Your cities are a little harder to perform Espionage missions against since your people are naturally reserved and don't brag openly about what they are involved in. [ICON_BULLET]Your cities suffer a little less from Crime since egotism drives a lot of criminal behavior and that isn't as problematic here. Penalties: [ICON_BULLET]Great People are a little slower to be born since achieving greatness is not highly important to people who see their Leader as a role model. [ICON_BULLET]Great Military People don't emerge quite as fast since competitive dominance is not a supported value here. [ICON_BULLET]World Wonders take longer to build because the nation doesn't feel it has anything to prove. [ICON_BULLET]Anarchy time when changing Civics is significantly longer since all voices in the policy discussion are heard and decisions aren't made until solutions all sides can settle on are found. [ICON_BULLET]Military units take longer to train since the warrior's natural competitiveness is a rare personality to find here. [ICON_BULLET]Your units are more easily captured when defeated because they don't see surrender as a strike against their pride.

TEXT.Polish: Cecha pozytywna "Wszystkie pomys³y nale¿y wys³uchaæ i szanowaæ. Oceniam wszystko poœrodku wszelkich sporów, aby dokonaæ najlepszych ustaleñ." TEXT.English: Humble II
TEXT.Polish: Skromny II

TEXT.English: Positive Trait "All ideas should be heard and respected. I judge all things down the middle of any disagreement to make the best determinations." This Leader enjoys a nation that is very productive in Gold, Espionage, Food and production. His people don't seek glory, which is as helpful with diplomacy. In fact, this is one of the most beneficial traits for working with other Leaders. However, on the downside, impressive works and the personal achievements that make individuals Great are not all that important to this society and are therefore harder to generate. Primary Benefits: [ICON_BULLET]All cities gain a percentage modifier to Gold and Espionage. [ICON_BULLET]All cities gain a percentage modifier to Food and Production. Side Benefits: [ICON_BULLET]All cities are a bit Happier since citizens are more comfortable with their limitations and are not as harmfully competitive with one another. [ICON_BULLET]Overall upkeep is reduced since there is improved cooperative efforts among governmental factions with competing needs. [ICON_BULLET]National Wonders and Team Projects are faster to build due to the degree of cohesive cooperation and willingness to enhance local support functions that your citizens display. [ICON_BULLET]All cities get an additional base Gold and Espionage. [ICON_BULLET]All cities get an additional base Food and Production. [ICON_BULLET]Gains a bonus to Diplomacy. [ICON_BULLET]Your cities are harder to perform Espionage missions against since your people are naturally reserved and don't brag openly about what they are involved in. [ICON_BULLET]Your cities suffer a little less from Crime since egotism drives a lot of criminal behavior and that isn't as problematic here. Penalties: [ICON_BULLET]Great People are slower to be born since achieving greatness is not highly important to people who see their Leader as a role model. [ICON_BULLET]Great Military People don't emerge as fast since competitive dominance is not a supported value here. [ICON_BULLET]World Wonders take longer to build because the nation doesn't feel it has anything to prove. [ICON_BULLET]Anarchy time when changing Civics is significantly longer since all voices in the policy discussion are heard and decisions aren't made until solutions all sides can settle on are found. [ICON_BULLET]Military units take longer to train since the warrior's natural competitiveness is a rare personality to find here. [ICON_BULLET]Your units are more easily captured when defeated because they don't see surrender as a strike against their pride.

Kary: [ICON_BULLET]Wielcy ludzie rodz¹ siê nieco wolniej, poniewa¿ osi¹gniêcie wielkoœci nie jest zbyt wa¿ne dla ludzi, którzy postrzegaj¹ swojego przywódcê jako wzór do naœladowania. [ICON_BULLET]Wielcy Wojskowi nie pojawiaj¹ siê tak szybko, poniewa¿ dominacja konkurencyjna nie jest tu wartoœci¹ wspieran¹. [ICON_BULLET]Budowa cudów œwiata zajmuje wiêcej czasu, poniewa¿ naród uwa¿a, ¿e nie ma nic do udowodnienia. [ICON_BULLET]Jednostki wojskowe potrzebuj¹ wiêcej czasu na szkolenie, poniewa¿ wrodzona konkurencyjnoœæ wojownika jest tutaj rzadk¹ osobowoœci¹. TEXT.English: Generically good in almost all areas of governing. Investment strategies and warnings are followed (+Gold) and Intelligence Advisors are often sought for advice (+Espionage). However, lacks for some aggression and in times of Great disagreements can greatly struggle to find a good solution to make all sides Happy.
TEXT.French: Généralement bon dans presque tous les domaines de la gouvernance. Les stratégies d'investissement et les avertissements sont suivis (+ or) et les conseillers en renseignement sont souvent recherchés pour des conseils (+ espionnage). Cependant, il manque une certaine agressivité et en période de grands désaccords, il peut être très difficile de trouver une bonne solution pour rendre toutes les parties heureuses.

TEXT.Polish: Ogólnie dobry w prawie wszystkich obszarach rz¹dzenia. Strategie inwestycyjne i ostrze¿enia s¹ przestrzegane (+Z³oto), a doradcy ds. wywiadu s¹ czêsto proszeni o poradê (+Szpiegostwo). Jednak w przypadku braku odrobiny agresji i w czasach wielkich nieporozumieñ znalezienie dobrego rozwi¹zania, które uszczêœliwi³oby wszystkie strony, mo¿e byæ znacznie trudniejsze.

TEXT.English: Impulsive CT
TEXT.Polish: Impulsywny CT

TEXT.English: Impulsive I
TEXT.Polish: Impulsywny I

TEXT.English: Negative Trait "The time taken to plan carefully is the time in which you lose the initiative. Act now or lose out! Sure it leads to lots of mistakes but its better than sitting still!" Gains a highly lubricated government. Low upkeep and faster results. Leader and his followers are not as mentally agile so since war is chaotic it is irritating to the habit driven people, and it takes longer to reorganize the government properly after a change in policies. Primary Penalties: [ICON_BULLET]Overall Upkeep is increased tremendously. [ICON_BULLET]All Specialists lose a Production. [ICON_BULLET]Maintenance from Distance to Capital is tremendously increased. [ICON_BULLET]Maintenance from Number of Cities is hugely increased. Side Penalties: [ICON_BULLET]Improvements naturally upgrade far slower since your people demand work crews come and get them upgraded immediately whenever an upgrade is available. [ICON_BULLET]Workers are much slower since they tend to start projects without plans and make a lot of time costly mistakes. [ICON_BULLET]Your units start with one less Experience point since your Leader is impatient to get them out of training. [ICON_BULLET]You lose a number of Free Units if you were getting any. [ICON_BULLET]You suffer a penalty to the number of Free Units you get based on a small percentage of your overall population. [ICON_BULLET]Your largest cities are less Happy thanks to sloppy urban planning making life harder on folks. [ICON_BULLET]Military Units are slower to train because training curricula are whatever the trainers feel like that day. Benefits: [ICON_BULLET]It takes a bit less Experience for your units to level and thus gain Promotions. [ICON_BULLET]Great Military People are slightly faster to emerge since your people find it natural to jump into leadership roles. [ICON_BULLET]Artist and Slave type Specialists are more freely creative and thus give an additional Culture. [ICON_BULLET]Civic Anarchy time is shorter since your Leader is impatient to implement new policies.

TEXT.English: Impulsive II
TEXT.Polish: Impulsywny II

TEXT.English: Negative Trait "The time taken to plan carefully is the time in which you lose the initiative. Act now or lose out! Sure it leads to lots of mistakes but its better than sitting still!" Gains a highly lubricated government. Low upkeep and faster results. Leader and his followers are not as mentally agile so since war is chaotic it is irritating to the habit driven people, and it takes longer to reorganize the government properly after a change in policies. Primary Penalties: [ICON_BULLET]Overall Upkeep is increased tremendously. [ICON_BULLET]All Specialists lose a Production. [ICON_BULLET]Maintenance from Distance to Capital is tremendously increased. [ICON_BULLET]Maintenance from Number of Cities is hugely increased. Side Penalties: [ICON_BULLET]Team Projects take longer to complete because the Leader is reluctant to invest in any project that must take so long to complete. [ICON_BULLET]Improvements naturally upgrade far slower since your people demand work crews come and get them upgraded immediately whenever an upgrade is available. [ICON_BULLET]Workers are much slower since they tend to start projects without plans and make a lot of time costly mistakes. [ICON_BULLET]Corporations require significantly more upkeep. [ICON_BULLET]Your units start with one less Experience point since your Leader is impatient to get them out of training. [ICON_BULLET]You lose a number of Free Units if you were getting any. [ICON_BULLET]You suffer a penalty to the number of Free Units you get based on a percentage of your overall population. [ICON_BULLET]Your largest cities are less Happy thanks to sloppy urban planning making life harder on folks. [ICON_BULLET]Military Units are slower to train because training curricula are whatever the trainers feel like that day. Benefits: [ICON_BULLET]It takes a bit less Experience for your units to level and thus gain Promotions. [ICON_BULLET]Great Military People are faster to emerge since your people find it natural to jump into leadership roles. [ICON_BULLET]Noble and Celebrity type Specialists are quicker to invest into what inspires them and thus give an additional Culture. [ICON_BULLET]Civic Anarchy time is significantly shorter since your Leader is impatient to implement new policies.

TEXT.English: Negative Trait "The time taken to plan carefully is the time in which you lose the initiative. Act now or lose out! Sure it leads to lots of mistakes but its better than sitting still!" Gains a highly lubricated government. Low upkeep and faster results. Leader and his followers are not as mentally agile so since war is chaotic it is irritating to the habit driven people, and it takes longer to reorganize the government properly after a change in policies. Primary Penalties: [ICON_BULLET]Overall Upkeep is increased tremendously. [ICON_BULLET]All Specialists lose a Production. [ICON_BULLET]Maintenance from Distance to Capital is tremendously increased. [ICON_BULLET]Maintenance from Number of Cities is hugely increased. Side Penalties: [ICON_BULLET]Team Projects take longer to complete because the Leader is reluctant to invest in any project that must take so long to complete. [ICON_BULLET]Improvements naturally upgrade far slower since your people demand work crews come and get them upgraded immediately whenever an upgrade is available. [ICON_BULLET]Workers are much slower since they tend to start projects without plans and make a lot of time costly mistakes. [ICON_BULLET]Corporations require significantly more upkeep. [ICON_BULLET]Your units start with one less Experience point since your Leader is impatient to get them out of training. [ICON_BULLET]You lose a number of Free Units if you were getting any. [ICON_BULLET]You suffer a penalty to the number of Free Units you get based on a percentage of your overall population. [ICON_BULLET]Your largest cities are much less Happy thanks to sloppy urban planning making life harder on folks. [ICON_BULLET]Military Units are slower to train because training curricula are whatever the trainers feel like that day. Benefits: [ICON_BULLET]It takes a bit less Experience for your units to level and thus gain Promotions. [ICON_BULLET]Great Military People are moderately faster to emerge since your people find it natural to jump into leadership roles. [ICON_BULLET]Law and Investigator type Specialists are faster to protect expressive rights and thus create a Culture each. [ICON_BULLET]Civic Anarchy time is significantly shorter since your Leader is impatient to implement new policies.

[ICON_BULLET]Maintenance from Number of Cities is hugely increased. Side Penalties: [ICON_BULLET]Improvements naturally upgrade far slower since your people demand work crews come and get them upgraded immediately whenever an upgrade is available. [ICON_BULLET]Workers are much slower since they tend to start projects without plans and make a lot of time costly mistakes. [ICON_BULLET]Corporations require significantly more upkeep. [ICON_BULLET]Your units start with one less Experience point since your Leader is impatient to get them out of training. [ICON_BULLET]You lose a number of Free Units if you were getting any. [ICON_BULLET]You suffer a penalty to the number of Free Units you get based on a moderate percentage of your overall population. [ICON_BULLET]Your largest cities are less Happy thanks to sloppy urban planning making life harder on folks. [ICON_BULLET]Military Units are slower to train because training curricula are whatever the trainers feel like that day. Benefits: [ICON_BULLET]It takes a bit less Experience for your units to level and thus gain Promotions. [ICON_BULLET]Great Military People are faster to emerge since your people find it natural to jump into leadership roles. [ICON_BULLET]Celebrity and Noble type Specialists are more freely creative and thus give an additional Culture. [ICON_BULLET]Civic Anarchy time is much shorter since your Leader is impatient to implement new policies. [ICON_BULLET]It costs significantly less to rush construction and training because it's totally normal to expedite things with a greater investment.
TEXT.Russian: Negative Trait 'The time taken to plan carefully is the time in which you lose the initiative. Act now or lose out! Sure it leads to lots of mistakes but its better than sitting still!' Gains a highly lubricated government. Low upkeep and faster results. Leader and his followers are not as mentally agile so since war is chaotic it is irritating to the habit driven people, and it takes longer to reorganize the government properly after a change in policies. Primary Penalties: [ICON_BULLET]Overall Upkeep is increased tremendously. [ICON_BULLET]All Specialists lose a Production. [ICON_BULLET]Maintenance from Distance to Capital is tremendously increased. [ICON_BULLET]Maintenance from Number of Cities is hugely increased. [ICON_BULLET]Military Units are slower to train because training curricula are whatever the trainers feel like that day. [ICON_BULLET]Celebrity and Noble type Specialists are more freely creative and thus give an additional Culture. TEXT.English: You suffer from a lot more upkeep and your people aren't as productive and suffer from a lack of organization. However, your military isn't as scared to specialize in whatever seems needed at the time.
TEXT.French: Vous souffrez de beaucoup plus d'entretien et vos employés ne sont pas aussi productifs et souffrent d'un manque d'organisation. Cependant, vos militaires n'ont pas aussi peur de se spécialiser dans ce qui semble nécessaire à l'époque.

TEXT.English: Lawful CT
TEXT.Polish: Praworz¹dny CT

TEXT.English: Lawful I
TEXT.Polish: Praworz¹dny I

TEXT.English: Positive Trait "No society is fit to function until all of its people can learn to follow the laws as established. Enforcing them is of the utmost importance." Ruling his nation with an Iron Fist, this Leader is not as concerned with whether the law is liberating or oppressive so much as that it is followed. He spends the resources needed on rooting out corruption, wherever it may exist. Primary Benefits: [ICON_BULLET]Each Military unit you staff in a city adds more Happiness. It's a comfort to know that if you can't get away with anything here, nobody else will either. [ICON_BULLET]Crime is significantly reduced in your cities. Unique Benefits: [ICON_BULLET]Your Law Enforcement units all gain the Lawful I Promotion, which enhances Crime Control and other benefits possessed by Law Enforcement units. Side Benefits: [ICON_BULLET]Battles inside your borders produce Great Military People faster due to the increased discipline required here. [ICON_BULLET]Your cities are a touch more stable on the Revolution option. [ICON_BULLET]Buildings involving Crime Fighting are constructed faster. [ICON_BULLET]Spy Type Specialists gain a Commerce each. [ICON_BULLET]Merchant Type Specialists gain an additional Gold. [ICON_BULLET]Technologies that represent advancements in Law Enforcement methods are faster to discover. [ICON_BULLET]Your Law Enforcement units are trained with an additional few Experience Points. [ICON_BULLET]Your Law Enforcement units are trained significantly faster. [ICON_BULLET]Your nation suffers less War Weariness since the public is less likely to offer resistance. [ICON_BULLET]Your largest cities are Happier since there is less fear of hidden threats in the crowd. [ICON_BULLET]Combat inside your borders produces slightly more Experience thanks to heightened discipline within your lands. [ICON_BULLET]Your cities are built to control everything, so are slightly easier to defend. [ICON_BULLET]It is moderately harder to perform Espionage Missions against your cities thanks to a high degree of authoritative monitoring. Penalties: [ICON_BULLET]Your cities are less Happy living under the rule of this total square who allows no naughty fun to be had. [ICON_BULLET]Generic Upkeep is higher since budget is poured into Law Enforcement without restraint. [ICON_BULLET]All cities are penalized a base Culture. [ICON_BULLET]Maintenance from Distance to Capital is higher. [ICON_BULLET]Maintenance from Number of Cities is higher. [ICON_BULLET]Access to Cannabis, Opium, Peyote, LSD, Meth or Ecstasy creates an Unhappiness each as it really freaks people out to be exposed to the Great personal risk involved in being associated with these substances.

TEXT.English: Lawful II
TEXT.Polish: Praworz¹dny II

TEXT.English: Positive Trait "No society is fit to function until all of its people can learn to follow the laws as established. Enforcing them is of the utmost importance." Ruling his nation with an Iron Fist, this Leader is not as concerned with whether the law is liberating or oppressive so much as that it is followed. He spends the resources needed on rooting out corruption, wherever it may exist. Primary Benefits: [ICON_BULLET]Each Military unit you staff in a city adds more Happiness. It's a comfort to know that if you can't get away with anything here, nobody else will either. [ICON_BULLET]Crime is significantly reduced in your cities. Unique Benefits: [ICON_BULLET]Your Law Enforcement units all gain the Lawful II Promotion, which enhances Crime Control and other benefits possessed by Law Enforcement units. Side Benefits: [ICON_BULLET]Battles inside your borders produce Great Military People faster due to the increased discipline required here. [ICON_BULLET]Your cities are a touch more stable on the Revolution option. [ICON_BULLET]Buildings involving Crime Fighting are constructed faster. [ICON_BULLET]Investigator Type Specialists gain a Commerce each. [ICON_BULLET]Investigator Type Specialists gain an additional Espionage. [ICON_BULLET]Technologies that represent advancements in Law Enforcement methods are faster to discover. [ICON_BULLET]Your Law Enforcement units are trained with additional Experience Points. [ICON_BULLET]Your Law Enforcement units are trained significantly faster. [ICON_BULLET]Your nation suffers significantly less War Weariness since the public is less likely to offer resistance. [ICON_BULLET]Your largest cities are Happier since there is less fear of hidden threats in the crowd. [ICON_BULLET]Combat inside your borders produces more Experience thanks to heightened discipline within your lands. [ICON_BULLET]Your cities are built to control everything, so are easier to defend. [ICON_BULLET]It is significantly harder to perform Espionage Missions against your cities thanks to a high degree of authoritative monitoring. Penalties: [ICON_BULLET]Your cities are less Happy living under the rule of this total square who allows no naughty fun to be had. [ICON_BULLET]Generic Upkeep is significantly higher since budget is poured into Law Enforcement without restraint. [ICON_BULLET]Great People aren't born as frequently here because people are heavily conditioned to stay within the lines. [ICON_BULLET]All cities are penalized a base Culture. [ICON_BULLET]Maintenance from Distance to Capital is higher. [ICON_BULLET]Maintenance from Number of Cities is higher.

It's a comfort to know that if you can't get away with anything here, nobody else will either. [ICON_BULLET]Crime is significantly reduced in your cities. Unique Benefits: [ICON_BULLET]Your Law Enforcement units all gain the Lawful III Promotion, which enhances Crime Control and other benefits possessed by Law Enforcement units. Side Benefits: [ICON_BULLET]Battles inside your borders produce Great Military People faster due to the increased discipline required here. [ICON_BULLET]Your cities are a touch more stable on the Revolution option. [ICON_BULLET]Buildings involving Crime Fighting are constructed faster. [ICON_BULLET]Law Type Specialists gain a Commerce each. [ICON_BULLET]Law Type Specialists gain an additional Espionage. [ICON_BULLET]Technologies that represent advancements in Law Enforcement methods are faster to discover. [ICON_BULLET]Your Law Enforcement units are trained with a strong amount of additional Experience Points. [ICON_BULLET]Your Law Enforcement units are trained significantly faster. [ICON_BULLET]Your nation suffers much less War Weariness since the public is less likely to offer resistance. [ICON_BULLET]Your largest cities are Happier since there is less fear of hidden threats in the crowd. [ICON_BULLET]Combat inside your borders produces more Experience thanks to heightened discipline within your lands. [ICON_BULLET]Your cities are built to control everything, so are easier to defend. [ICON_BULLET]It is significantly harder to perform Espionage Missions against your cities thanks to a high degree of authoritative monitoring. Penalties: [ICON_BULLET]Your cities are less Happy living under the rule of this total square who allows no naughty fun to be had. [ICON_BULLET]Generic Upkeep is much higher since budget is poured into Law Enforcement without restraint. [ICON_BULLET]Great People aren't born as frequently here because people are heavily conditioned to stay within the lines. [ICON_BULLET]All cities are penalized a base Culture. [ICON_BULLET]Maintenance from Distance to Capital is higher. [ICON_BULLET]Maintenance from Number of Cities is higher.
